1b1('dul ba): / 'dul ba gzhi// bam po nga drug pa//
1b2('dul ba): thams cad zil gnon thams// cad gzigs// thub pa 'jig
1b3('dul ba): rten kun la sman/ / sred pathams cad zad pa brnyas//
2a1('dul ba): @#sbyor ba kun gyi mthar phyin mdzad// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad
2a2('dul ba): rig thub chun thams cad mngon par mkhyen/ / 'kho na dang 'jigs pa kun las 'das//
2a3('dul ba): chos kun gyi ni pha rol gshegs// bsam pa kun la mkhas pa po// srid pa thams cad
2a4('dul ba): rab tu bcom/ / sems can kun la phan dgongs pa// mdud pa thams cad rab tu grol/
2b1('dul ba): bag la nyal kun bcad nas ni// 'ching ba thams cad yang dag bcad// sems can kun gyi mchog rab ste// thub pa chos rnams
2b2('dul ba): ston par mdzad/ / sems dpa' chen po shes rab che// brtson 'grus chen po grags pa che// chos chen 'od ni chen po pa// chos chen
2b3('dul ba): don gyi pha rol gshegs/ / klu chen seng ge chen po pa// dge slong chen po drang srong che// shes rab chen po ral gri mtshon// nyon mongs
2b4('dul ba): chen po rab tu bcom/ / stobs dang brtson 'grus rab tu che// brtan pa chen po pha rol gnon// byang chub chen po brnyes pa gang //
2b5('dul ba): dgra chen rnams las rnam par rgyal// nad chen po yi dpyad mdzad pas// bcom ldan sman pa chen po legs// 'dod chags chen
3a1('dul ba): @##/ / po zil gnon la// sman chen po ni stsol ba po// 'khor ba chen po'i btson ra na// 'ching ba chen pos bcings rnams la// thugs rje chen po
3a2('dul ba): dang ldan pas/ / 'ching ba kun las grol bar mdzad// skyes bu chen po lha chen po// tshogs rnams kyi ni tshogs chen ldan// sbyin pa'i mchog ni sbyin
3a3('dul ba): chen po/ / zhi ba chen po'i go 'phang reg/ sems can mchog ste drang srong mchog/ de bzhin rnam par 'dren mchog brnyas// nyan thos mchog ni phun
3a4('dul ba): sum tshogs/ / chos kyi mchog ni rab ston pa// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i mchog/ yon gnas rnams kyi mchog tu 'os// rnam par grol ba rnam
3a5('dul ba): kyi mchog/ mtshan ni mchog rab kun dang ldan// bcom ldan srid las rab tu grol// srid pa'i dga' ba las 'phags pa// srid pa'i 'dod chags
3a6('dul ba): kun nas bcad/ / srid pa'i sred pa rab tu bcom// chos chen po ni bsgoms pas na// 'jigs dang 'jigs su rung ba spangs// klu yi rgyal po
3b1('dul ba): rnams kyi gnas/ / ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// thams cad bya ba byas pa yi// nyan thos rnams kyis mdun byas te// lnga brgya rnams dang thabs gcig tu// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' las
3b2('dul ba): gshegs/ / chu bo de yi 'gram dag tu// smra ba'i mchog ni bzhugs nas ni// rjes su brtse ba thugs rje can// lus can kun la phan mdzad pas// mtsho la gzigs nas dge slong la//
3b3('dul ba): 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// ngas ni sdig pa gang byas dang // nga yi tshig 'di mnyan par gyis// ngas ni sngon gyi tshe rabs su// g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gyur// rang sangs rgyas ni legs/
3b4('dul ba): smon te// skyon med la ni skur pa btab// skye bo'i tshogs chen lhags nas su// thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'// bcing ba dam pos de bcings nas// grong khyer nas ni phyung ba dang //
3b5('dul ba): dge sbyong bcing bas dam bcings nas// sdug bsngal gyur te nga yis mthong // de la snying rje bskyed nas kyang // nga nyid kyis ni thar par byas// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba rnams
3b6('dul ba): su yun rings 'phangs/ / slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na// ngas ni skur pa thob par gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas kyang // nga yi yang srid tha ma la// mu stegs rnams kyis mdzes ma'i phyir//
3b7('dul ba): yang dag ma yin skur pa btab// nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na// gsang tshig 'dzin cing mang thos pa// bram ze lnga brgya rnams la ni// tshal na gsang tshig brjod pa'i tshe// mngon shes lnga ldan rdzu
4a1('dul ba): 'phrul che/ / byin chen drang srong der 'ongs pa// bkur sti byed pa ngas mthong nas// skyon med la ni skur pa btab// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces// ngas ni bram ze'i khye'u la
4a2('dul ba): smras/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams nga yi tshig/ thos nas rjes su yi rang zhing // de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis// khyim dang khyim du slong ba na// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces// skye bo mang po dag la smras/
4a3('dul ba): las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dge slong lnga brgya dag dang yang // mdzes ma kho na'i rgyu las ni// skur pa dag ni thob par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon gyi// nyan thos gyur pa gnas 'jog
4a4('dul ba): bu/ de tshe dge sbyong de la ni// ngas ni mi bden skur pa btab// sdig pa'i las de byas pas na// mi bzang ngan 'gror song nas ni// sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su
4a5('dul ba): myong / / de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// nga la bram ze rtsa mis 'dir// skye bo'i tshogs ni 'dus pa na// yang dag ma yin skur pa btab// nor gyi phyir ni skyon med par// ngas ni g.yas khyim nu bo ni// ri
4a6('dul ba): yi gseb tu bcug nas su/ / ngas ni rdo ba dag gis bsnun// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba dag tu yun rings 'phangs// rab tu tshe dang thig nag gi/ sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar gyur//
4a7('dul ba): de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// lha sbyin gyis ni rdo 'phangs te// nga'i zhabs kyi mthe bo ni// rdo ba'i dum bus rma yang phyung // rgya mtsho yi ni gru bo ches// rgya mtsho la ni 'gro ba na// gru na 'dug pa'i tshong
4b1('dul ba): pa ni/ mdung thung rnon pos bsad par gyur// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba rnams su yun rings 'phangs// de yi las kyi lhag mas nga'i// zhabs la tshal pa zug par gyur// sngon ni ka di/
4b2('dul ba): grong khyer gyi// nya ba'i bur ni gyur pa na// nya rnams gsod par byed pa dang // yid dga' ba ni skyes par gyur// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// nga ni dmyal bar yun rings 'phangs// rab tu tsha dang thig nag
4b3('dul ba): dang / sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// gang gi tshe na 'phags skyes pos// shAkya rnams ni gsod pa na// klad pa mi bzang nad kyis thebs// rnam par gzigs
4b4('dul ba): kyi gsung rab kyi/ / nyan thos yongs su smang byas te// khyed ni nas ngag za bar 'os// khyed la 'bras ni mi rigs zhes// ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang // las kyi rnam par smin pa des//
4b5('dul ba): dmyal ba thig nag rnams su ni// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// dgra mthar dbyar ni gnas bcas te// bram ze yis ni spyan drangs tshe// zla ba gsum du nas/
4b6('dul ba): dag zos// nga ni sman par gyur pa na// tshong dpon bu pho 'khrur 'jug tshe// nad kyi sdug bsngal gyur pa la// sman ma yin pa ngas byin no// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su
4b7('dul ba): myong de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ / de 'dra'i 'khru ba'i nad kyis thebs// sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su// nga ni mthu can kyang gyur tshe// stobs dag 'byed par byed pa na// ngas ni gyad kyi bu zhig bsad
5a1('dul ba): las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ / sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// 'di na nga yi rgyab srung ngo // sngon ni ngan spong bur gyur pa// dga' skyong la
5a2('dul ba): ni smras pa ni/ / mgo reg ngas mthong ci zhig bya// 'di la byang chub yod ma yin// ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang // las kyi rnam par smin pa des// 'dir yang mir ni 'ongs pa na// khyim med par ni rab
5a3('dul ba): byung nas/ / byang chub mchog ni 'dod pa'i phyir// lteng rgyas 'gram du lo drug tu// mchog tu dka' ba spyad pa ngas// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // sems can kun gyi rab mchog gis// chos
5a4('dul ba): kyi dam pa thugs chud nas/ / sdig pa'i las ni gang mdzad pa// tshogs kyi mchog la bka' stsal to// thams cad zil mnon stobs brnyes kyis// dge slong dge 'dun gung bzhugs nas// ma dros pa
5a5('dul ba): yi mtsho chen du/ / nyid kyi 'phrin las lung bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs gcig
5a6('dul ba): tu/ mtsho chen po ma dros par 'phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas/ ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ mnyan yod kyi ri rigs 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so//
5a7('dul ba): dgas 'dzin gyi ma sags/ bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ mnyan yod du gshegs nas/ gnyen yod kyi bdag gi khang bzangs kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos
5b1('dul ba): so/ / thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas ri
5b2('dul ba): dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen
5b3('dul ba): po ma dros par/ rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya gang dag lags pa dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan
5b4('dul ba): 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ ri dgas 'dzin phyi ma sa gas gnang bar rig nas zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes
5b5('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la chos dang /
5b6('dul ba): ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas/ gtsug la
5b7('dul ba): khang du byon pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la
6a1('dul ba): ma rdzogs pa yod de/ des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na/ 'on kyang dge 'dun gyi ched du yon ma phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu
6a2('dul ba): zhing gshegs pa na/ grong khyer thigs pa can du byon nas/ grong khyer thigs pa can gyi byang phyogs kyi grong khyer shing sha ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag
6a3('dul ba): rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas zhes bya ba nas shing sha ba'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur
6a4('dul ba): phrad cing 'dus te/ grong khyer thigs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag
6a5('dul ba): par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gangan
6a6('dul ba): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi snum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang
6a7('dul ba): bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom
6b1('dul ba): ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas yi dgas rus gong sbrel pa bsgreng ba lta bu/
6b2('dul ba): rang gi skrag yog pa lto ri tsam/ kha khab kyi mig tsam/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun nas yongs su
6b3('dul ba): bskor te/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'di dag ni bdag cag gi nye dur gyur pa lags na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse
6b4('dul ba): ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag cag kho na'i ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dam zhig bcas te/ gal te khyed cag cha byad 'di nyid kyis yon sngo ba byed pa'i tshe 'ong na ni
6b5('dul ba): khyed cag gi ming nas yon bsngo ba bya'o/ / de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das g.yar tshe lags na/ ji ltar mchi lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa
6b6('dul ba): ngotsha med la ngo tsha byed/ ngo tsha ba la ngo mi tsha// 'jigs pa med la 'jigs par lta// 'jigs pa la ni mi 'jigs lta// log pa'i lta ba blangs pas na// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro// ngo tsha ba la ngon
6b7('dul ba): dang / / ngo tsha med pa ngo mi tsha// mi 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs lta// 'jigs pa la ni 'jigs lta ba'i// yang dag lta ba blangs pa yis// sems can rnams ni bde 'gror 'gro// de rnams kyis gsol
7a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na mchi lags so/ / de nas grong khyer thig pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang / ba
7a2('dul ba): bdag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas/ snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yi dgas lnga brgya po de dag 'ongs
7a3('dul ba): pab dang / de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ yi dgas rnams mthong nas 'phros par brtsam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i
7a4('dul ba): phyir 'bros/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yi dgas 'o ni dag mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshur shog/ 'di dag ni khyed cag gi nye du yin no// gal te
7a5('dul ba): khyed cag gis gnang na/ ngas 'di rnams kyi gal te khyed cag gis gnang na/ ngas 'di rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo'o// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rung lags so// de nas bcom ldan
7a6('dul ba): 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ de rnams kyi ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad de/ sbyin pa 'di yis bsod nams gang // de ni yi dgas rjes 'gro zhing // 'di dag yi dgas 'jig rten ni// /
7a7('dul ba): mi bzad pa nas myur ldang shog/ de yis gos dang skom dang zas// gnas mal rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dus kun tu ni mi zad par// de rnams la ni grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs
7b1('dul ba): pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/
7b2('dul ba): gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams rtog khang du lhags shing tshogs nas/ 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed de/ kye dge
7b3('dul ba): sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen che zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen che ba yin no// kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang
7b4('dul ba): 'dod zhen chung ste/ mu stegs can rnams ni de lta ma yin no// de'i tshe bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges/ grong
7b5('dul ba): khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'dod zhen che 'am/ 'dod zhe na chung ba dang / de'i nyan thos rnams 'dod zhe na che'am/ 'dod zhen
7b6('dul ba): chung ba ngas khyed cag yid ches par bya'o/ / de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan
7b7('dul ba): go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/ bdag gis bca' ba bu ram zhig 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze spa 'dod kyi seng ge
8a1('dul ba): la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
8a2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge klan ka tshol bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bca' ba bu ram la spyan
8a3('dul ba): drangs kyis/ khyed cag las gang gis ji tsam yog pa des de tsam zhig blang bar bya'o// bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge la bu ram 'tshong ba'i khang pa lnga brgya yod pa nas/ des bu ram gyi khang pa re re nas/ bu rom
8a4('dul ba): gyi snod blangs te/ bu ram gyi snod lnga brgya khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan go'u ta ma bu ram bsdogs lags
8a5('dul ba): na/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ longs spyad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag dang lhung bzed bcabs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa
8a6('dul ba): nyid la bzhugs so/ / de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges bu ram gyi snod gcig blangs te brim par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi bar du brims kyang lhag
8a7('dul ba): pas/ thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'dug pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas de dad pa skyes nas phyogs mtha' dag tu sgra bsgrags pa/
8b1('dul ba): shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no// de nas des mu stegs can rnams bu ram la longs spyod du gzhug pa'i phyir mgron du bos pa dang /
8b2('dul ba): de rnams kyis bu ram bag med par blangs nas/ kha cig gis ni longs spyad do// kha cig gis ni snod bkang nas bor zhing khyer te song ngo // de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges smras pa/ skyes bu blun po khyed
8b3('dul ba): cag kho na 'dod zhen che ba yin la/ dge sbyong go'u sa ni 'dod zhen chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur
8b4('dul ba): te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs
8b5('dul ba): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag ces bya ba nas/ tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba nas/ dge slong tshur
8b6('dul ba): shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungs pas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnam
8b7('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ de lto bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dus sam dus ma yin pa 'am/ na ba 'am/ mi na bas bu ram la longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge ro
9a1('dul ba): myags pa'i dri mi zhim pas/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid ma thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge ni/ srid pa tha ma pa yin na/ ci'i phyir bden pa
9a2('dul ba): ma mthong snyam du dgongs na/ lus rul ba'i dri mi zhim pa las gyur par gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong smras 'dod
9a3('dul ba): kyi seng ge'i gtsug lag khang dri dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor la/ gnas mal la yang bdug pas bdug cing / me tog dri zhim pos brgyan pa'i me tog gi
9a4('dul ba): gdugs res shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// ji tsam na de bsod snyoms la song ba de'i bar du/ de'i gtsug lag khang du
9a5('dul ba): song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin thams cad byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / lha'i 'byor
9a6('dul ba): pa mthong nas/ de nas dga' ba'i yid kyis bsod snyoms la longs spyad de/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/ skyil
9a7('dul ba): mo krung bcas te/ lus drang por bsrang nas/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste 'dug pa dang / dri zhim po mnam nas de'i sems mnyam par gzhag par skyes so// de nas des nyon mongs pa thams
9b1('dul ba): cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas zhes bya ba nas/ mngon du smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge/
9b2('dul ba): slong dag nga'i dge slong dang / nga'i nyan thos sdug pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge 'di yin no// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom
9b3('dul ba): thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong gzhan rnams ni/ mi sdug pas rnam par grol na/ tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge/ sdug pas rnam par grol ba la gzigs
9b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya bstud mar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos shing / de nyid du skyes te/ da ltar gyi srid pa tha ma mi rnams su skyes pa na/
9b5('dul ba): lus rul pa'i dri mnam pas sems rtse gcig pa ma grub pa'o// dri zhim po'i dri mnam nas sems mnyam pa thob nas sdug pas rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to// gal te 'di la thabs 'di ma byas par gyur
9b6('dul ba): na/ dro bar gyur pa yang 'dis bskyed par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ gzhan gang zhig sdug pa 'di lta bus rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba des rim pa de lta bu bya ste/ 'di la 'gyor par ni mi bya'o//
9b7('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas/ ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i
10a1('dul ba): gnas na bzhugs so/ / yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/
10a2('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang gcig tu 'dus nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas
10a3('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes grag gis/ gal te bdag cag re re nas bcom
10a4('dul ba): ldan 'das spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na ni/ bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs dang / gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas/ de la khrims shig bcas te/ ci nas kyang tshogs shing 'dus
10a5('dul ba): pa kho nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol gyi/ mi gcig pus ni ma yin no zhes de rnams kyis khrims su bca' ba dag byas nas bzhag go/ de'i tshe yangs pa can na bsod nams chen po
10a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa bzhi gnas te/ nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma'o// de dag gi khyim du ni lha dang / mi rnams kyi yang babs par gyur to// de rnams
10a7('dul ba): kyis khrims su bcas pa de ma thos par/ khyim bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzi
10b1('dul ba): gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang yangs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga'
10b2('dul ba): bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas khyim bdag nor can stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na de logs su thal mo
10b3('dul ba): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad
10b4('dul ba): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas/ khyim bdag nor can la gnang ngo // de nas khyim bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom
10b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams yangs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan
10b6('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi snum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba'i
10b7('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog gi bu dag/ ba sngar khyim bdag nor can gyis spyan drangs zin to// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag nor can gyis ni tshogs
11a1('dul ba): kyi khrims bcas pa las 'das par byas so/ / kha cig dag gis smras pa/ ci ste de 'das par byed/ gdon mi za bar des khrims bcas pa ma thos so// 'on kyang bdag cag pas de ni
11a2('dul ba): skyes bu dam pa yin pas/ gdugs tshod gsol du chug/ bdag cag gis ni gnangs gdugs tshod gsol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos
11a3('dul ba): thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ shar sgo nas zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas rnams sta gon ma byas pa mthong nas/ de
11a4('dul ba): nas khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyim bdag khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa
11a5('dul ba): 'phags pa kun dga' bo ci ste de skad gsung / khyim bdag gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ khyim bdag shar nas
11a6('dul ba): so/ / 'phags pa lho nas zhugs shig/ de zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shing / lha'i zhal zas rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes
11a7('dul ba): par gyur to/ / de nas khyim bdag nor can gyi spyan 'dren gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i
11b1('dul ba): dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan
11b2('dul ba): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas nor can gyi chung ma stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
11b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag gi snum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du
11b4('dul ba): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi chung ma la gnang ngo // gnang nas kyang khyim bdag nor can la chos bshad pa mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//
11b5('dul ba): nor can gyi chung mas kyang zhal zas rnams sta gon byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim/
11b6('dul ba): gang na ba der so pa ste phyin nas/ lho sgo nas zhugs nas/ gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas rnams kyang sta nyon ma byas par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang nor can gyi chung ma la 'di skad ces smras
11b7('dul ba): so/ / khyim bdag gi chung ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs na ci snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung / gdan ma bshams shi
12a1('dul ba): zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo / / 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ lho nas so// 'phags pa shar nas zhugs shig/ ji tsam na gdan bzang po
12a2('dul ba): bshams shing / zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi chung ma'i spyan 'dren gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod
12a3('dul ba): gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig
12a4('dul ba): nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
12a5('dul ba): gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig
12a6('dul ba): tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi bu la gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
12a7('dul ba): nor can gyi chung ma la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so/ / nor can gyi bus kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar
12b1('dul ba): langs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lho sgo nas zhugs nas/ gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa yang mthong ngo //
12b2('dul ba): mthong nas kyang nor can gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gi bu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs na ci snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags
12b3('dul ba): pa ci ste de skad gsung / gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ lho nas so// 'phags pa nub nas bzhugs shing / ji
12b4('dul ba): tsam na gdan bzang po bshams shing / zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi bu'i spyan 'dren gyis/ bcom ldan
12b5('dul ba): 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed
12b6('dul ba): gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi mna' ma stan las langs te/
12b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par
13a1('dul ba): gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi mna' ma la gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
13a2('dul ba): nor can gyi bu la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so/ / de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
13a3('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
13a4('dul ba): gyis zhes bya ba nas/ cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom
13a5('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag cag gi snum
13a6('dul ba): par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog gi bu dag nga sngar nor can gyi mna' mas spyan drangs zin to// de nas
13a7('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams rngam nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nor can gcig pu la nor yod kyis/ bdag cag la med dam/ ci nas des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
13b1('dul ba): 'dun nyi ma re re gdugs tshod gsol zhing / bdag cag kho nas skabs ma thob par gyur/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis spras pa/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
13b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas gshegs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i khyim rdo ba re re nas bkogs te gzhig go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang chos
13b3('dul ba): gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ nub sgo nas zhugs na/ gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo // mthong nas
13b4('dul ba): kyang nor can gyi mna' ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ / nor can gyi mna' ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs na ci snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags
13b5('dul ba): pa ci ste de skad gsung / gdam ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo // 'phags pa chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ nub nas so// 'phags pa byang nas zhugs shig/ de nas
13b6('dul ba): byang nas zhugs na/ ji tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shing / lha'i zhal zas sta gon byas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi mna' ma'i spyan 'dren gyis/
13b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshong bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi
14a1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag thams cad 'dus nas/ khyim
14a2('dul ba): bdag nor can gyi sgo na 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag yangs pa can gyi tshogs rngam nas sgo na 'dug ste/ de dag gis
14a3('dul ba): khyod la gnod pa byas par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ song la bzod pa gsol cig/ de phyir byung nas bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag ci khyod gcig pu la nor
14a4('dul ba): yod dam/ gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyin re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ kho bo cag gis skabs mi rnyed par byed/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag
14a5('dul ba): gis tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa ma thos kyis/ de bas na tshogs kyis bzod par bya ba'i rigs so// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di ni dam pa yin pas/ 'di la bzod
14a6('dul ba): par bya'o zhes/ de rnams bzod par gyur pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te de lta na nang du zhugs shig/ de rnams khyim du zhugs pa dang / gdan bzang po bshams shing zhal zas bsod pa rnams sku
14a7('dul ba): gon byas pa yang mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur nas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar 'os kyi/
14b1('dul ba): kho bo cag ni ma yin no// des de rnams la rin po che dag byin pa dang / de rnams kyis ma blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin po che 'di dag ni rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/ long /
14b2('dul ba): zhig/ de rnams kyis blangs pa las/ gang gis ci 'dra ba blangs pa de'i kha dog de 'dra ba kho nar snang bar gyur to// de nas nor can gyi mna' mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs
14b3('dul ba): par rig nas/ gtsang zhig bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur par rig nas/ snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
14b4('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
14b5('dul ba): dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang thos na nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi
14b6('dul ba): rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas/
14b7('dul ba): lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba nas/ bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong
15a1('dul ba): gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi
15a2('dul ba): bar mngon par dad lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan//
15a3('dul ba): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// 'dul ba gzhi// /
15a4('dul ba): / bam po nga bdun pa// / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nor can dang / nor can gyi mchis brang
15a5('dul ba): dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shing / lha dang mi rnams kyi dpal nyams
15a6('dul ba): su myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di rnams kho nas las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces
15a7('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA ra NA si na/ me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
15b1('dul ba): byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig bcas so// des de yang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs so// de dus
15b2('dul ba): phyi zhig na bkren zhing shin tu bkren par gyur nas/ de dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / mna' mas brtson pa chen pos 'bad pas/ dar yug gcig cig grub nas/ de nas me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan yang
15b3('dul ba): de bgos nas rgyal po la me tog 'phreng 'bul/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi chung ma yang de nyid bgos nas btsun mo la 'bul/ me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu yang de nyid bgos nas gzhon nu rnams la 'bul/
15b4('dul ba): me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma yang de nyid bgos nas rgyal po'i mna' ma rnams la me tog 'phreng 'bul bar byed do// sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/ 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman
15b5('dul ba): pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba/ gnas mal bas mtha' la bsten pa/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ nyi ma
15b6('dul ba): nub ka'i dus su wA ra NA sir phyin nas/ me tog 'phreng rgyu mkhan de'i khyim grong khyer gyi sgo na 'dug pa de'i ldum rar nub mo gnas btab ste/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas me tog 'phreng
15b7('dul ba): rgyud mkhan des/ me'i phung po 'bar ba lta bur mthong nas/ de dad pa skyes te/ chung ma la smras pa dang / de yang dad par gyur to// des bu la smras pa dang / de yang dad par gyur to// des mna' ma la
16a1('dul ba): smras pa dang / de yang dad par gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa/ bdag cag sang zan ma zos kyang bla/ 'dus la/ rang byung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can 'di//
16a2('dul ba): bshos gsol lo// de nas nam langs nas/ de rnams kyis de la bsod snyoms phul lo// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyis smras pa/ bzang mo kho bo'i ras kyi bgo skal gang yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung //
16a3('dul ba): ba 'di la dbul lo// des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi yang dbul lo// bus smras pa/ bdag gi yang dbul lo// mna' mas smras pa/ bdag gi yang dbul lo// de nas de rnams 'dul nas/ de la
16a4('dul ba): ras bskon to/ / bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyi chos ston gyi/ tshig gis ma yin pas/ de nas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ 'bar ba dang / gas
16a5('dul ba): ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/ shing rtsa nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la
16a6('dul ba): gtugs te/ smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing //
16a7('dul ba): bdag cag gi khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang 'bab par gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/
16b1('dul ba): ces byas so// de nas rang sangs rgyas kyis de rnams la snying brtse bas rdzu 'phrul byas nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi steng na phar chas te song ba dang / de'i grib mas rgyal po'i steng du bab pa dang / de gdong
16b2('dul ba): bstod de blta bar brtsams pa dang / bdag nyid chen po de mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag nyid chen po 'dis yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i rtsa ba phyung bar gyur snyam mo// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal
16b3('dul ba): po la me tog 'bul ba'i dus gang yin pa de las theg gi tsam zhig yol lo/ / rgyal po yang me tog la sdod cing 'dug go// de nas me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis bkug pa
16b4('dul ba): dang / rgyal pos/ de la smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis me tog de ring dus las yol/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos ji snyed gyon pa byin no// de bzhin du me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan
16b5('dul ba): gyi chung ma la ni/ btsun mo rnams kyis ji snyed gyon pa byin no// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu la ni/ gzhon nu rnams kyis so// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma la ni/ rgyal po'i mna'
16b6('dul ba): ma rnams kyis te/ de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la nor gyi me tog mngon par grub par gyur te/ dbul ba med par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan
16b7('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni/ nor can 'di nyid yin no// me tog 'phreng rgyun mkhan gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni/ nor can gyi chung ma yin no// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu gang yin pa de ni/ nor can/
17a1('dul ba): gyi bu yin no// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma ni/ nor can gyi mna' ma yin te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing / smon lam btab pa gang yin pa
17a2('dul ba): de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/ khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang babs par gyur to// nga'i spyan snga nas kyang bden pa mthong bar byas te/
17a3('dul ba): ngarang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa/ 'di dag gis mnyes par byas kyi/ mi mnyes par ni ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa
17a4('dul ba): rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams lhag
17a5('dul ba): par yang mngon par dad par gyur nas/ stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
17a6('dul ba): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/ bdag cag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad
17a7('dul ba): rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas/ yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la gnang ngo // de nas yangs pa can gyi
17b1('dul ba): khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas
17b2('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/
17b3('dul ba): stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang
17b4('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las
17b5('dul ba): bzhengs te gshegs so/ / de nyid du nyi ma gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du 'das so// yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'khor rgya chen po mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ de rnams
17b6('dul ba): kyi nye du dag zas kyi phyir nyi ma re re zhing 'ong bas/ de dag gis gtses par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bdag cag gi nye du dag sgur mchis te/
17b7('dul ba): de rnams la bdag cag gdugs gcig bzhin stsol bas/ khyed cag dang de rnams la khyad par rngo mi thogs na/ kye 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis yo byad rnams dbul gyis/ zhal ta kho na mdzad cig/ dge
18a1('dul ba): slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o zhes/ dge slong rnams kyis skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
18a2('dul ba): de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis zhal ta bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bar brtsams te/ ji tsam
18a3('dul ba): na steng g.yogs med par thug pa 'tshod pa'i zhal ta byas pa las/ lhas char phab pas/ des ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
18a4('dul ba): pa/ steng g.yogs med par btso bar mi bya'o// sgo khang dang khyams su 'tshed par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang dang khyams su btso bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bas
18a5('dul ba): na/ rung ba'i gnas kyi gzhir/ mi rung ba ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ 'di rnams su zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ steng g.yogs med pa dang / sgo khang dang / khyams dang / bsro khang
18a6('dul ba): dang / khrus khang dang / rgyal po'i gnas dang / mchod rten gyi gnas dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / khyim bdag gi gnas dang / dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngo // gzhi bcu po 'di dag ni
18a7('dul ba): rung ba ma yin pa'i gnas kyi gzhi yin te/ de rnams su dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// zhal ta byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// // sdom ni/ nang bu can dang zas dag dang //
18b1('dul ba): g.yar chus lhag pa dag dang yang // tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang // pad+ma'i rtsa dang lug dag go/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod na dge slong nang bu can zhig yod pa des
18b2('dul ba): sman pa dris pa/ bzhin bzangs dag kho bo la sman ston cig/ des nad kyi gzhi dris nas smras pa/ 'phags pa thug pa gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom
18b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / / sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas/ 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yod do// des skabs de dge slong rnams
18b4('dul ba): la'o/ / dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pa thug pa 'thung zhig ces zer na/ sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa
18b5('dul ba): btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i nad g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer te byin no//
18b6('dul ba): de nas sman pas 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod bde 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs mi bde'o// ci khyod kyis thug pa ma gsol lam/ 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo'o//
18b7('dul ba): 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// sang ni dron mo gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis blangs nas grang mo kho na rnyed nas/ des de bsros te byin no// de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du
19a1('dul ba): dris pa dang / des smras pa/ mi bde'o// ci thug pa ma gsol lam/ 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo zhig bsros nas so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig/
19a2('dul ba): bgyis so// de grang ste bsros pa lags kyis/ sang ni rang bzhin gyis dron por mdzod de gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis// 'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas// gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi
19a3('dul ba): shing drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa la/ de nas khwa'i rtug pas de ma rung bar byas pas/ dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan
19a4('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o zhes bka'
19a5('dul ba): stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang / ji tsam pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba'i gnas lnga ste/ rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang / sems gtod pa'i
19a6('dul ba): mtha' can dang / ba nyal ba lta bu dang / stong pa'i gnas dang / bskos pa'o// de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas gnas rtsom pa na/ der thog mar gzhi 'di ni/
19a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes sems bskyed cing / tshig tu smras pa ste/ 'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// sems gtong ba'i mtha' can gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
19b1('dul ba): dge slong lag gi bla sa der thog mar rdo ba 'deg pa na/ nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i nges par zung zhig/ nges par
19b2('dul ba): zung zhig ces bya ba ste/ 'di ni sems gtod pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgo tha dad par gsas pa ste/ 'di ni ba nyal ba lta bu zhes byas/ gnas stong pa gang
19b3('dul ba): zhe na/ spangs pa'i gnas te/ 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o// bskos pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba dang / gnyis kyi las kyis bskos pa'o// dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsko ba ma shes nas/
19b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa la/ dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o// /
19b5('dul ba): bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la/ gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang /
19b6('dul ba): dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang
19b7('dul ba): dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad lags pa/
20a1('dul ba): nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
20a2('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas
20a3('dul ba): thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad lags pa/
20a4('dul ba): nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge
20a5('dul ba): 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su
20a6('dul ba): bskor lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i su bskos pa der gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang / mtshams
20a7('dul ba): kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// yangs pa can na sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i
20b1('dul ba): 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis/ de'i ched du sha khyer te 'ongs nas/ de yang za bar byed do// gang gi tshe des/ bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ mi za bas khyer te 'ongs na yang dge
20b2('dul ba): slong rnams la sbyin par byed do/ / dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang / mu stegs can rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ shes ldan dag sde dpon seng ge'i
20b3('dul ba): ched du byas te/ sha khyer te 'ongs na ni/ des de dag ma zos la/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la byin pa dang / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyis ched du byas pa'i sha ni zos so zhes bya ba'i
20b4('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes
20b5('dul ba): gsungs pa/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi ched du byas par mngon sum du mthong ba/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las khyod kyi ched du byas pa
20b6('dul ba): yin no zhes thos pa/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / rang nyid kyi blo las rnam par rtog pa skyes pa/ tshul 'di las ni bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam du rung ba ma yin
20b7('dul ba): pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/ / dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag gi ched du byed
21a1('dul ba): par mngon sum du ma mthong ba rung ba sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las 'dis khyed kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar
21a2('dul ba): bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa'i tshul las 'di bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam pa ma skyes pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no//
21a3('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong dag ltogs par gyur pas/ de rnams glos phab ste 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
21a4('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i bstan pa la/ ci'i slad du glos phab ste bzhugs shing / dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mu
21a5('dul ba): ga dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bsod snyoms lto 'grangs par mi rnyed pas/ kho bo cag ltogs te nyam chung bas/ des na glos phab ste 'dug go/ de rnams kyis smras pa// ci ste zhal tshus mi
21a6('dul ba): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
21a7('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur dge slong rnams kyis g.yar chus bza' bar bya ste/
21b1('dul ba): 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong rnams la/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa
21b2('dul ba): 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de
21b3('dul ba): yang bza' bar 'dod na/ 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang
21b4('dul ba): ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'dod na/ sngar blangs zin to snyam du sems la/ sngar rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi
21b5('dul ba): ni mnyan yod na'o/ / mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la mgron du bos nas/ de rnams
21b6('dul ba): kyis zos pa dang / bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ched du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyis/ snoms te bzhud
21b7('dul ba): la phyis gsol cig/ de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo // dong nas de yang za bar 'dod na/ 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
22a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ pu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'di dag ni byin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la
22a2('dul ba): 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams zas la mgron du bos
22a3('dul ba): te/ de rnams kyis zos nas/ bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhag ste/ dge slong rnams dong ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na
22a4('dul ba): la yongs su btang ba lags te/ 'tshal te mchis la/ khyed kho na la dbul lo zhes/ de rnams kyis te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams de la yang za bar 'dod na/ 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs
22a5('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur/ sngar
22a6('dul ba): yongs su btang ba'o snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams
22a7('dul ba): kyis nub phyogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba yin pas/ 'phags pa rnams la dbul lo zhes/ de dag gis
22b1('dul ba): dge slong rnams zas zos nas spang ba byas pa rnams la de dag byin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams
22b2('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas bgyid pa las/ de ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas/ khyed
22b3('dul ba): rnams kyang da ni yon gnas su gyur pa lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na/ ci bdag cag gi dge ba'i shul brgyags dang bral te/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar bgyi 'am/ de
22b4('dul ba): lta bas na thugs brtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ rnyed dka'
22b5('dul ba): ba yin no snyam bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin te/ rgun 'brum dang / bal po se'u dang / 'brag go dang / star rga
22b6('dul ba): dang / yon tshe dang / shing tog u ra ma na dang / shing tog ku ru ma yi ka dang / shing tog ni ko tsa dang / shing tog ba b+hu dang / shing tog sin ci ka'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod
22b7('dul ba): na'o/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang / chu nas skyes pa dag phul ba dang / dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spang ba byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma
23a1('dul ba): zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza'
23a2('dul ba): bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la chu nas skyes pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ut+pa la'i rtsa ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / ku mu da'i sa bon dang / pad+ma'i sa bon no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan
23a3('dul ba): yod na'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur to// de'i rim gro byed pa che dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bdag rang gi glos
23a4('dul ba): ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyi/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyi/ maM la bdag gis dri'o snyam nas/ des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
23a5('dul ba): khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur na/ / de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/
23a6('dul ba): gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba phal pa'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam du bsams nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pas mnyan yod nas
23a7('dul ba): mi snang bar gyur te/ dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang /
23b1('dul ba): de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir b+h+yon/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang ban kan 'khrugs nas/ de la sman pas
23b2('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma bstan to/ / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na re zhig gzhes shig/ de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas/ mi'i tshad tsam gyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba
23b3('dul ba): dag bton cing bton cing / pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i skyo ra gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi bu chen pos
23b4('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa la blta bar brtsams pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci gzigs/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol bar bzhed dam/ de cang mi smra bar
23b5('dul ba): 'dug pa dang / smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lhung bzed bkang ba khyer nas dal gyis 'bab
23b6('dul ba): kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyir to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin pad+ma'i rtsa
23b7('dul ba): ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to/ / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la pad+ma'i rtsa ba khur gcig bskur nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la
24a1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi khyams kyi mdun du zhog la shog cig/ de rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa'i mthus/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du'ong/
24a2('dul ba): nas/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi mdun du bzhag nas/ slar log pa yas lam gyi phyed na tshal gyi ba glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na baglang mo de las baglang phyug
24a3('dul ba): gu gcig 'brangs te/ 'brangs pa'i mod la seng ge'i sgra 'byin no// de nas ba glang mo de skrag pas gcin rtug gtor nas/ ba glang phrug gu bor te bros so// de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i
24a4('dul ba): shing mkhan zhig shing gi ched du tshal du song ba las/ ba glang phrug gu de mthong nas/ khyim du blangs te/ bsnun gsos bskyed de/ nor gyis bskyangs pas/ ming nor skyong nor skyong zhes bya
24a5('dul ba): bar grags so/ / kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor skyong skyes su bskur ba las/ de mnyan yod kyi yul na gnas pa la/ skye bos nor gyis bskyangs
24a6('dul ba): pas na/ nor skyong zhes 'don no// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos zos/ kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kha cig ni dge 'dun la brims pa las 'on kyang
24a7('dul ba): lhag par gyur to/ / de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas nas kyang ba 'dod na/ bdag cag gis spang ba byas so zhes ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
24b1('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge sbyong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' bas/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ngo // pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' ba
24b2('dul ba): yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba
24b3('dul ba): drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi bran mo'o// khyim bdag lug bsod
24b4('dul ba): nams che bar ji ltar shes she na/ gal te bang mdzod stong pa rnams la bltas nas/ mthong ma thag kho nar gang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so//
24b5('dul ba): lug gi chung ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa ni/ brgya stong gi bza' ba 'byung ste/ lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bu ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i sreskyed pa
24b6('dul ba): lalnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug la/ des gang gi tshe brgya 'am stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ lug gi bu ni de lta
24b7('dul ba): bu yin no/ / lug gi mna' ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du dri sbyar na/ brgya stong khyed par 'gyur te/ lug gi mna' ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bran po ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang
25a1('dul ba): gi tshe zhing la rol gcig rmos pa de'i tshe/ zhing la rol bdun rmos par 'gyur te/ lug gi bran po ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bran mo ji ltar na bsod nams che bar shes
25a2('dul ba): she na/ de gang gi tshe gang tsam drus pa de'i tshe/ bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams tsha ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi gdul
25a3('dul ba): ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing / grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis//
25a4('dul ba): khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing / grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de dag ni chos gos rnams long zhig ces sgo zhig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal
25a5('dul ba): zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed
25a6('dul ba): cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing / grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de dag ni chos gos rnams long zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnam
25a7('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba/ 'khor zhib/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ljongs rgyu zhing / grong khyer bzang bye
25b1('dul ba): du gshegs so/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams mtha' 'khob tu dong ba las/ de nas kha cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong
25b2('dul ba): nas gnas pa de rnams kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rod rong por gyur nas/ bdag cag sngon ni dge sbyong go'u ta mas yul dbus nas spyugs so// de gal te/
25b3('dul ba): 'dir 'ongs na gdon mi za bar bdag cag 'di nas spyugs par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo// de rnams rigs kyi khyim dag tu dong nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur
25b4('dul ba): cig/ chos thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag de ci lags/ shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis/ 'gro'o// ci'i slad du re zhig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis//
25b5('dul ba): ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'dong ngo // 'phags pa dag bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing / du ma
25b6('dul ba): zhig bu med pa dang / khyim thab med par byed cing 'ong ngo // 'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar gzhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig/
25b7('dul ba): ma bzhud cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ci ste 'dug/ khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan du mi btub bo// 'phags pa dag gsungs shig/ mnyan par bgyi'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/
26a1('dul ba): shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas phyung la/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du chud cig/ rtswa sngon po rnams ni rngos shig/
26a2('dul ba): 'dug gnas rnams ni shig cig/ me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni chod cig/ chu rnams ni dug lugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig dang / thams cad
26a3('dul ba): bgyi'o/ / de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du btsud de/ rtsa sngon po rnams ni bcas/ 'dug
26a4('dul ba): gnas rnams ni bshig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni bcad/ chu rnams ni dug blugs so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma
26a5('dul ba): yin pa byed pa yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
26a6('dul ba): mdzad pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong du rgyu zhing gshegs par bya 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
26a7('dul ba): kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bde ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o snyam nas/ des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ song la chu dug can rnams skoms shig/ char pa
26b1('dul ba): 'babs pa'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ 'di rnams kyis bskams pa dang / khyod kyi chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas khong zhig/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi rnams la yang bsgo ba/ khyed kyis grong
26b2('dul ba): khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas thob cig/ de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni chu dug can rnams bskams so// char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bus ni der yang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan
26b3('dul ba): bas bkang ngo / / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas btab nas/ ljongs rnams 'byor zhing rgyas par gyur to// mu stegs can rnams
26b4('dul ba): kyis grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams pa sogs nas/ de rnams kyis rtog chen dag ma ngags te/ ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shig/ de rnams dong ba las/ ljongs rnams
26b5('dul ba): lhag par yang 'byor zhing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas/ slar 'ongs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag ljongs rnams 'di lta bur 'byor zhing rgyas pa ni/ sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong
26b6('dul ba): ngo / / mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis mthong ngam/ re zhig gang zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang sgyur bar byed pa des/ khyed cag sbyar bar mi byed pa
26b7('dul ba): de lta srid re skan/ khyed cag rnam pa thams cad du bltas zin te/ blta ba'i mtha' ma byas nas 'gro'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig/ khyed cag la dge sbyong
27a1('dul ba): go'u ta mas ci zhig 'gyur mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba slong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ ci des khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam
27a2('dul ba): ma ma/ mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te/ gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing / gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par kar sha pa Na drug
27a3('dul ba): cus gcad par khrims 'cha' na 'dug go/ de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du
27a4('dul ba): gshegs nas/ bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo grong khyer bzang byed du bag mar btang ba de ra ba'i kha na 'dug pas/ bcom ldan 'das mun
27a5('dul ba): khung na bzhugs pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ni 'di yin te/ gal te 'di la them
27a6('dul ba): skas shig yod par gyur na/ bdag mar me thogs la 'babs pa zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ them skas zhig sprul lo// de nas de snying dga' ba dang /
27a7('dul ba): mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas mar me thogs te them skas las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mar me bzhag nas/ zhabs gnyis
27b1('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phags
27b2('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
27b3('dul ba): bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bu mo khyod tshur khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang / de la ngan re/ nad med par gyur cig ces smos la/ 'di skad ces kyang smros shig/
27b4('dul ba): khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho narang 'dir 'ongs na/ khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de cig rigs same/ gal te tshogs kyis khrims su bca'
27b5('dul ba): bar byas so zhes smras pa dang / khyod kyi bu'i sked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des/ gal te brgya 'am stong 'god par gtang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing / yongs su
27b6('dul ba): zad par mi 'gyur na/ khyod kar sha pa Na drug cu byin nas 'ong mi nus sam zhes smros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas chas
27b7('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang / smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das
28a1('dul ba): khyod la nad med par gyur cig ces gsung ngo / / des smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim bdag la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
28a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ khyod kho na'i ched du nga 'dir gshegs na/ khyod spro bcad nas 'jug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba cig rigs sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo tshogs kyis khrims
28a3('dul ba): su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o/ / gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kar sha pa Na drug cu'i chad pas gcad do zhes bcas so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das
28a4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi bu'i skad pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod cig btags te 'dug pa des/ gal te brgya 'am stong 'god par gtang na gang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing / yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na/ kar sha pa Na
28a5('dul ba): drug cu byin nas/ khyod 'ong bar mi nus sam zhes gsung ngo // des bsams pa/ 'di ni sus kyang mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gro'o snyam nas/ nges kar sha pa Na drug
28a6('dul ba): cu sgor bzhag nas/ bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them skas las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom
28a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i
28b1('dul ba): bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ khyim bdag lug gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong
28b2('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o/ / des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang / cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/
28b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod las brten nas phal cher kun gyis thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
28b4('dul ba): phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/ de khyim du phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kar sha pa Na'i phung po bcer te/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba
28b5('dul ba): 'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod med pa/ / mtshungs pa med pa gser gyi mdogo can blta 'dod pa// de ni 'jigs med snying gis shin tu nges byos la// myur du dengs shig de yi nor ni kho bos
28b6('dul ba): gzhal/ / skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur ram/ des smras pa/ dge bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na tshogs
28b7('dul ba): kho nas khrims su bcad pa tshogs kho nas shig tu zad mod/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsams so// de nas phan tshun sngos
29a1('dul ba): pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang / gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'dus pa'i skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phangs pas rab dral nas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma kha cig
29a2('dul ba): ni ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo // de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad gcig tshun chad
29a3('dul ba): 'khor bar 'dug go/ de nas bcos ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ sems can du ma dag
29a4('dul ba): gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de nas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
29a5('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// // 'dul ba gzhi// // bam po nga brgyad pa// // bcom ldan 'das
29a6('dul ba): kyi yun ring zhig tu chos bshad pas/ gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
29a7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag zas kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// des gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
29b1('dul ba): mar dang / bu ram dang / hwags dang / sha kha ra dang / btung ba dag go/ de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yon mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams
29b2('dul ba): myur du sta gon gyis shig/ de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon byas so// de nas khyim bdag lug gis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca'
29b3('dul ba): ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/ ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i
29b4('dul ba): tshogs de yang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du btul te gshegs pa na/ khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shul gyi snyan brgyags kyi zod kar sha pa Na dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan
29b5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha pa Na blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/
29b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba byed pas so// rung ba byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
29b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis bslab pa'i gzhi bcu par gser dngul mi len pa gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis
30a1('dul ba): blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor ngas 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi/ mi blang
30a2('dul ba): ba ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'i/ blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das
30a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa 'am/ dge tshul med na/
30a4('dul ba): dge slong gis zhag bdun par byin gyis bslabs nas/ rang nyid kyis 'khur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya bar ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
30a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis bkrus nas sbyin len byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug nas/
30a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i sman 'di bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir/ zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab bo zhes/ de skad lan gnyis lan
30a7('dul ba): gsum du brjod par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes
30b1('dul ba): gang gsungs pa su zhig gis 'tshal bar bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs pa dang / smyung ba byas pa dang / nad pa dang / dge skos dang / lag gi blas
30b2('dul ba): so/ / dge slong ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis 'bras dang phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las/ lam gyis ngal nas bza' bar 'dod nas/ 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
30b3('dul ba): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag des zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus pas/ 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sprugs
