59a2('dul ba): shes ldan dag khyed cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas/ kye ma'o dum bu shi'am bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de tshegs chung ngus grub kyis dngas shig/ kho bo ni bros pa yin no// de
59a3('dul ba): rnams kyis rgyal po'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir/ mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas/ log ste rgyal po la smras pa/ lha blon po'i mchog dum bu ni bros so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ma legs
59a4('dul ba): so snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ / dum bu yang rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin to// de'i tshe yangs pa can na rigs gsum du gnas te/ rigs dang po na ni khang pa rtseg ma bdun stong pa
59a5('dul ba): gam gser las byas so/ / ris bar ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma khri bzhi stong pa gam dngul las byas so// ris tha ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma nyi khri chig stong pa gam zangs las byas pa ste/ de rnams na ni mi
59a6('dul ba): dam pa dang / bar ma dang / phal pa rnams ci rigs par gnas so// yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis khrims su bcas te bzhag pa ni/ ris dang por bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de ni ris dang po nyid
59a7('dul ba): du gtong bar byed kyi/ bar mar ma yin/ tha mar ma yin no// bar ma'i gang yin pa de ni ris dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do// tha ma'i gang yin pa de ni ris gsum char du gtong bar byed de
59b1('dul ba): bud med rnams ni yangs pa can ma gtogs par/ gzhan du mi gtong zhing / mi 'byin no// bud med rin po che ni su la yang mi gtong bar/ tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs spyad pa kho nar byed do//
59b2('dul ba): dum bu ni skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te/ ris dang por khang pa byin nas/ de na gnas par brtsams pa las/ gang gi tshe tshogs 'dus pa de'i tshe/ de bos kyang 'dur ma btub nas/ de la
59b3('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu khyod ci'i phyir mi 'du/ des smras pa/ 'du ba kho na las bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas bdag mi 'du'o// yangs pa can pa rnams
59b4('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ dum bu 'dus shig/ 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung / des 'du bar brtsams nas/ blo gros ma byin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu blo gros byin cig/ des
59b5('dul ba): smras pa/ gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas na/ blo gros ni mi sbyin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ blo gros byin cig/ 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung / de
59b6('dul ba): tshogs dang lhan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin to/ / sngon yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams gang su la yang rung yi ge spring bar byed na/ rtsub po dang bcas par spring bar byed do// gang gi tshe dum
59b7('dul ba): bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe/ 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do// gang dag la 'jam po dang bcas pa'i yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/ shes ldan dag gang
60a1('dul ba): gis na yangs pa can gyi tshogs sngon rtsub pa dang bcas par spring bar byed pa las/ da 'jam po dang bcas par byed par gyur pa la rgyu ci zhig yod/ gzhan dag gis smras
60a2('dul ba): pa/ khyad par yod de/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchog dum bu der 'ongs nas/ de dag de'i blo gros bzhin byed de/ des na da ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed do// dum bus sa
60a3('dul ba): skyong dang / seng ge khyim phub nas/ seng ge rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig bcas te/ de'i bcas ston rgya cher byas nas/ gos can zhes
60a4('dul ba): bya bar btags so/ / de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ khye'u zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ des pha srog dang phral nas/ rang nyid cod phan bcings te/ rgyal srid byed par 'gyur
60a5('dul ba): ro zhes lung bstan to/ / de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ nye gos can
60a6('dul ba): zhes bya bar btags so/ / de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ bu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pas yangs
60a7('dul ba): pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos chel rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis
60b1('dul ba): de dag gi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma bya zhig ces/ des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas/ skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis/ dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi mi li
60b2('dul ba): tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ li tsa byi 'di dag ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di la gnod pa byas su 'ong gis/ 'di slar bzlog cig/ des de bkug
60b3('dul ba): nas smras pa/ bu yangs pa can gyi li tsaM byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di dag gi skyed mos tshal ma rung bar ma bya zhig/ de dag gis gnod pa byas sa re/ des smras pa/
60b4('dul ba): yab 'di dag la ni skyed mos tshal mchis na/ bdag cag la ma mchis so// des smras pa/ bu skyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la gsol ba gdab bo// des tshogs la gsol ba
60b5('dul ba): btab pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gi bu gnyis la skyed mos chel ma mchis kyis/ bdag la skyed mos tshal cig thugs dpag mdzad pa'i rigs so// de rnams kyis de dag la skyed
60b6('dul ba): mos tshal rnying pa zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/ de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed du bcug go/ cig shos kyis ni zhal sros
60b7('dul ba): byas so/ / de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na/ sa skyong dang / seng ge'i sA la'i tshal na bzhugs zhes brjod do// sa skyong gis
61a1('dul ba): bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas/ li tsa byi rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed do// de nas dum bus bkug ste bsgo ba/ bu khyod tshogs
61a2('dul ba): 'khrug par ma byed par/ ri 'or che ge mo zhig tu song la/ der rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug cig/ de der song nas rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta bya
61a3('dul ba): bar brtsams so/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas/ de rnams kyis blon po'i mchog dum du sde dpon du bcug pa las/ des kyang dus thung ngu zhig tu chos dang
61a4('dul ba): mthun pas sde dpon byas nas shi'o/ / yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces byas pa dang / de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ blon po'i mchog dum bus tshogs yongs su bskyangs
61a5('dul ba): pas na de nyid kyi bu gzhug go/ / kha cig gis smras pa/ de'i bu sa skyong ni gdug pa rtsal po che zhig ste/ gal te sde dpon du bcug na/ gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur ro// de'i nu bo seng ge
61a6('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni nges pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa zhig pas/ gal te tshogs 'dod na sde dpon du gzhug go/ thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas
61a7('dul ba): seng ge'i gan du song ste/ seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no// des smras pa/ sa skyong ni bdag gi phu bo yin pas de sde dpon du chug cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ seng ge sde dpon khyod kyi
61b1('dul ba): rigs brgyud kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci/ tshogs gang la 'brang ba des sde dpon bya bar zad mod/ gal te khyod mi 'dod na kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du gzhug go/ des bsams
61b2('dul ba): pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na/ de ni ma 'os pas ye bkur ro snyam nas des khas blangs pa dang / de rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go/ yangs pa
61b3('dul ba): can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri ba las/ gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe/ seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis
61b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar bya'o/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ri 'or na sa skyong rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri 'or gang yin pa der spring ba 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye
61b5('dul ba): ste bklags nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni yangs pa can gyi tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ da ni seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka'
61b6('dul ba): stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ ci kho bo'i pha shi 'am/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shi'o// de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ phu bo nga 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba ci
61b7('dul ba): ga rigs sam/ seng ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang / de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsams pa/ bdag la yangs pa can rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa
62a1('dul ba): byas kyis/ rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o snyam nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lha'i btsan phag na mchis par 'tshal lo zhes pho nya btang ngo // des de la/
62a2('dul ba): spring ba/ 'ong ba legs kyis shog cig ces spring ngo // de rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/
62a3('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa des skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad
62a4('dul ba): thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na/ ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/ lha thong thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs
62a5('dul ba): dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni pha 'gums pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/ cig shos la ni mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar
62a6('dul ba): 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ lha'i ched du de gang khrid de mchi/ bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'o// de nas sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba/ rgyal
62a7('dul ba): bo gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ khyod kyi nye gos can tshur sgris shig dang / btsun mo dam par 'gyur ro// des de la yi ge lan spring ba/ gar bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri
62b1('dul ba): bapar zad kyi/ khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid shes so// ji ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ yangs pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtang ngo zhes
62b2('dul ba): bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang / kho bos de skyed mos tshal du phyung ba dang / de'i tshe khyod kyis khrid de song zhig/ de nas sa skyong gi rgyal po la mchi
62b3('dul ba): phyag byas nas/ shing rtar zhugs te yangs pa can du song ba las/ rim gyis phyin nas skyed mos tshal du bsdad do// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srungs shig shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes
62b4('dul ba): pa des/ yangs pa can rnams la bstan pa/ bdag ni mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyis/ bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la/ mgul par dril spyongs shig dang / gal te yongs
62b5('dul ba): pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na/ bdag gis ji tsam du zin pa 'am/ 'bros par gyur pa srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs
62b6('dul ba): brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dril btags te/ gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gtor ma dang / me tog 'phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag go// sa skyong gis seng ge la spring
62b7('dul ba): pa/ kho bo skyed mos tshal na sdod kyis byung zhig/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste/ nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis/
63a1('dul ba): rgyan rnams thogs la skyed mos tshal du byung zhig/ de rgyan rnams 'dogs par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ ci zhig gi phyir rgyan
63a2('dul ba): rnams 'dogs/ kho bo bag mar btang ngo // su zhig la/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la'o// des smras pa/ kho mo bu mo yin na/ khyod ci ste bag mer btang / gal te de ltar na
63a3('dul ba): khyod rgyan thogs shig/ de yang smra ba las dril gyi sgra byung ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs rod rod por gyur te/ bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs so// seng ge dngangs pas/
63a4('dul ba): nye ges can yin no snyam nas/ gos can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang / sa skyong yang dngangs pas/ gos can shing rtar bcug ste song ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin
63a5('dul ba): bsnyags nas/ de dang de rnams su lhan cig 'thab par brtsams pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byung ba yin pas/ des li tsa byi lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas
63a6('dul ba): khyed cag las lnga brgya gnad du bsnun zin gyis/ lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar dengs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ nged cag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do// go phud cig/
63a7('dul ba): de rnams kyis go phud pa dang / lnga brgya sa la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yin no snyam nas skrag ste bros so// yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar
63b1('dul ba): brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra la gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams lan glon du gzhug gis/ glegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas rgya skyegs la rgyus btab nas gzhag go/
63b2('dul ba): zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go// sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/ nye gos can bobs shig/ des smras pa/ khu gu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te//
63b3('dul ba): bdag ni gos can lags so// khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras
63b4('dul ba): pa/ sa skyong 'ongs sam/ 'ongs pa lags so// lha bdag mchis lags so// nye gos can khrid de 'ongs sam/ lha khrid de mchis kyang mchis la/ khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so//
63b5('dul ba): ci zhig zer/ nye gos can lags snyam nas/ gos can khrid de mchis so// bltas khrid de shog cig/ de nang du khrid pa dang / rgyal pos lhag par yang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs
63b6('dul ba): pa mthong nas/ bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas mthong ma thag kho nar/ rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bu pha gsod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas
63b7('dul ba): gal te ngal bu yod par gyur na/ de bcas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o// de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pas na//
64a1('dul ba): lus 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// re zhig dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal
64a2('dul ba): po gzugs can snying po ri dgas kyi phyir byung ba na/ bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig nus so// ji tsam na ri dgas mda'i long la btags pas skrag pa
64a3('dul ba): zhig/ drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing 'byung ba/ rgyal po'i mdas gnad du bsnun no// de nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan
64a4('dul ba): gzan gdug pas kyang gzem par bya bar/ ri dgas skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsad dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de skad du kha zer ba dang / dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha 'di
64a5('dul ba): su la g.yar mchi/ rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la yin na/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/ lha de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so// gal te de ltar na ngas
64a6('dul ba): drang srong de yongs su spangs so/ / de gsad par brtsams te/ de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can 'dis bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa gsad par sgris pa/
64a7('dul ba): gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/ yang bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu sbas pa/ shin tu bsrungs pa/ shin tu bcas pa yin pas/ gal te gzhan du skye ba
64b1('dul ba): blangs na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du smon lam 'dis bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur cig ces byas so// des smon lam log par//
64b2('dul ba): btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyes so// gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la khrag gi char bab bo// gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o bdag gi sa lha'i rgyab
64b3('dul ba): kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ / de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di
64b4('dul ba): ni btsun mo'i rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so/ / rgyal po sems khongs su chud de 'dug nas/ 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar 'gyur snyam mo// mkhas
64b5('dul ba): pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha ras kyi bar rtsang shas bltam par bgyis te gsol la/ de nyid btsun mo la stobs mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas
64b6('dul ba): pa bgos nas/ bdag nyid gos can la bstabs pa dang / des rgyab kyi sha yin no snyam nas zos so// de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o
64b7('dul ba): bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas khrag blud pas/ de 'dod pa de dang yang bral bar gyur to// ji tsam na
65a1('dul ba): zla ba dgu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig bcas so// bcas te gang gi nyi ma la bcas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la yang khrag gi char
65a2('dul ba): bab bo/ / rgyal pos yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na/ gdon ma 'tshal bar khye'u 'dis lha
65a3('dul ba): sku tshe dang phral nas/ rang nyid cod pan bcings te/ rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyis
65a4('dul ba): 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo/ / de'i tshe yangs pa can na li tsa byi ming chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i skyed mos tshal na a mra'i tshal yod
65a5('dul ba): pa las/ der glo bur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa kun dga'i ra ba srung bas mthong ngo // de ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des ltas
65a6('dul ba): mkhan rnams bkug nas dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de bsrung du gsol cig dang / dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
65a7('dul ba): khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ skyed mos tshal der kun nas srungs ma'i mi rnams bkod nas/ nyi ma bgrang ba la zhugs so// ji tsam na zhag bdun
65b1('dul ba): lon pa dang / skyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i bog por dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang
65b2('dul ba): mang po bres/ me tog sil mas bkram/ glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma
65b3('dul ba): dang lhan cig byung nas/ skyed mos tshal de na/ de rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ chu shing gi sdong po gas nas/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes
65b4('dul ba): pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo // de nas ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang / des smras pa/ lha 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen
65b5('dul ba): gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas/ 'di'i ming a mra skyong ma zhes bya'o// ji tsam na khyim bdag ming chen skyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ bu mo a mra
65b6('dul ba): skyong ma bskyed bsrings te zhes bya ba nas/ chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de slong ba'i phyir yul khrung khrung ba rnams dang / shAkya rnams dang / gzhan yang yul sna tshogs
65b7('dul ba): na gnas pa'i rgyal po dang / blon po'i bu dang / tshong ba dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon du ma dag 'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsams pa/ gang kho na la ma byin pa de kho na sdang
66a1('dul ba): dgos so/ / zhag bdun lon na khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ sngar ram phyis byas kyang rung / de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams phyir
66a2('dul ba): byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad 'tshong ma'i yin pas/ gal te mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa brtags na/ su zhig
66a3('dul ba): de'i khyim du 'jug/ de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas/ tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to// yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis dga' dgur spyad pa'i phyir/ de'i khyim du 'jug par
66a4('dul ba): brtsams pa las/ de na kha cig ni yul la chags ches pa'i phyir/ mthong ma thog kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to// kha cig gis ni reg pa kho nas te/ de la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya
66a5('dul ba): ba ma byas so/ / des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyis/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/
66a6('dul ba): shes ldan dag gang na rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ phyug po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa 'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la bris shig/ de rnams kyis ji
66a7('dul ba): ltar mthong ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas a mra skyong ma rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/ ri mo'i las rnams la so sor brtags te dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'di dag ni gang zhig/ 'di dag ni rgyal
66b1('dul ba): po rab snang ngo / / gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lo// gzhan 'di gang zhig/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed do// gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
66b2('dul ba): can snying po'o/ / des de bzhin du dris pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smras so// de nas des thams cad la brtags pa dang / gzugs snying po la mig chags nas/ des bsams
66b3('dul ba): pa/ skyes bu 'di lta bur chu zheng gab pas ni/ bdag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad par nus so snyam mo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi
66b4('dul ba): khang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas/ blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas/ tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan dag sus smad 'tshong ma ji lta bu mthong / sa skyong gis
66b5('dul ba): smras pa/ lha re zhig gzhan lta zhog la/ yangs pa can na smad 'tsheng ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba/ shin tu gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi 'tshol pa/
66b6('dul ba): lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so// des smras pa/ sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dong/ de dang lhan cing dga' dgur spyad do// des smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi
66b7('dul ba): rnams ni yun ring po nas gnod pa bgyid pa/ slar rgol ba/ dgra bo lags pas/ khyod la gnod pa bgyis su mchi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi rnams ni skyes bu'i
67a1('dul ba): bar 'gyur na/ 'on kyang tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pas/ ri zhig tshogs la brtag go snyam nas/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan dag
67a2('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis skyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig rnyed pa de/ bdag gis bsnun/ bstod de bskyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gi rigs brgyud dang 'tsham par
67a3('dul ba): 'ga' zhig la chung mar sbyin na/ tshogs kyis ltos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che mi gtang ste/ tshogs kyis
67a4('dul ba): spyad do zhes bcas pa yin gyis/ re zhig bu mo de ci 'dra ba bltas/ khrid de shog cig/ des de tshogs kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/
67a5('dul ba): tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrad de/ kun tu brtag par brtsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis/ su la yang mi sbyin no//
67a6('dul ba): de nas khyim bdag ming chen yid mi bde zhing / rang gi khyim du song nas/ de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang / a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab
67a7('dul ba): ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/ bu mo khyod bud med rin po che yin no zhes/ tshogs kyis spyad par gyur te/ bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs so// yab khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam
67b1('dul ba): mo sngon tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che ni tshogs kyis spyad do zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do// des smras pa/
67b2('dul ba): dam zhig bcas te gal te bdag la tshogs kyis dam pa lnga zhig stsal na/ bdag gis tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang por khang pa stsal ba dang / skyes pa gcig nang du zhugs pa na/
67b3('dul ba): cig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang / nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kar sha pa Na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe/ bdag gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang
67b4('dul ba): bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag pa'o// ming chen gyis/ a mra skyong ma'i 'phrin bzlas pa dang / tshogs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du bya ste/
67b5('dul ba): ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la/ ris dang po'i khang pa ni bud med rin po che kho na la 'os so// gcig nang du zhugs pa na/ cig shos nang du mi 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de
67b6('dul ba): yang bden te/ sha kho na rnams la ni/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha kho na tha chad yin pas/ gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa dang / cig shos kyang nang du zhugs na/ gdon mi za bar
67b7('dul ba): gcig la gcig gsod par 'gyur ro/ / nang du 'jug pa des kar sha pa Na lnga brgya thogs te/ nang du 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang rgyan du
68a1('dul ba): dpal snying can yin pas 'dod do/ / des smras pa/ lha gal te don ma mchis pa la gtsigs cher mdzad na gshegs mod/ de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan
68a2('dul ba): cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas/ sa skyong ni skyed mos tshal na sdod do// rgyal po ni a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo // yang
68a3('dul ba): pa can gyi li tse byi rnams rod rod por gyur nas/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs
68a4('dul ba): can snying po sa/ a mra skyong ma la dris pa/ bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ lha sdum par nyul bar bgyid do// ci zhig gi phyir/ lha'i slad du'o// ji ltar bya/ ci 'bros sam/ lha mi dgyes par ma
68a5('dul ba): mdzad cig/ lha dgung bdun lon pa dang / bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas/ re zhig dgung bdun du rol pas dgyes par mdzod/ dgyes dgur mdzod la/ dgung bdun lags dang / dus
68a6('dul ba): mkhyen par bgyi'o/ / de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can
68a7('dul ba): snying po la smras pa/ lha bdag la sems can zhugs lags so// de la seng ras gcig dang / sor gdub rgya byin nas smras pa/ gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyod nyid kyi yin no// 'on te khye'u yin na seng
68b1('dul ba): ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du sgri zhig/ de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang / dril bu ma 'khrol bar 'dug go/ de rnams kyis
68b2('dul ba): smras pa/ shes ldan dag dag po byung gis/ rje bzhin btsal lo zhes li tsa byi sbyin 'khor gyi mda' rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa dang / sa skyong
68b3('dul ba): gis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ lha yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams mchi na/ lha ci 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi 'am/ 'on te shing rta bda'/ des smras pa/ nga ni dub pas shing rta de
68b4('dul ba): kyis/ khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo khye zhig/ des de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las/ yangs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes cas/ de rnams kyis smras
68b5('dul ba): pa/ shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyis/ slar log go/ de rnams slar log nas/ yangs pa can du 'ongs te/ 'dus nas yang khrims bcas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag
68b6('dul ba): gi dgra 'di la yang gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha glon du gzhug go zhes bcas so/ / ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / a mra skyong ma la khye'u gzugs bzang po/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug
68b7('dul ba): pa zhig bcas so/ / bcas nas zhes bya ba nas/ bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de yangs pa can gyi li tsi byi'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams
69a1('dul ba): kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig smras pa/ bran mo'i khye'u khyod brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni skyes na/ pha su yin/ des dus nas ma'i drung du song ba dang / des smras pa//
69a2('dul ba): bu ci'i phyir du/ des thams cad rgyas par smras pa/ bu gal te yang dris dang / nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do zhes smros shig/ gal te su yin zhes smras dang / rgyal po
69a3('dul ba): gzugs can snying po yin no zhes smros shig/ ji tsam na de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis/ de la de bzhin du smras pa dang / des smras pa/ nga'i pha lta bu
69a4('dul ba): ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do/ / su yin/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no// de rnams kyis shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra gang yin pa de ni 'di'i pha yin no zhes lhag par yang
69a5('dul ba): brdegs so/ / des dus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang / des bsams pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/ gal te 'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i
69a6('dul ba): gnas de yod do snyam mo/ / de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang / tshong pa rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba de dag des mthong nas smras pa/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'dis snod rgyas
69a7('dul ba): thob la dengs shig dang / sho gam mi gcod par 'gyur ro// khye'u 'di yang rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'di'i mgul du thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor lo gcig/ de rnams
69b1('dul ba): kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes blangs so/ / bu la yang mu tig gi do shal zhig byin nas smras pa/ bu rgyal po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus dang / mu tig gi do shal rkang pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs te
69b2('dul ba): bang du 'dug cig/ gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi she pa rig go zhes spu dang / del bu pas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam nas spros shig/ de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis rgyas
69b3('dul ba): po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas te/ sor gdub kyi rgya btags nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / dri rgyal po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mu ti ga gro
69b4('dul ba): ma nang po la banag nas 'jigs te pang du 'dug go/ / rgyal pos smos pa/ shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes bzhig go// des smras pa/ yab bu pas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchi
69b5('dul ba): phags sam/ de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun tu smras pas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so// 'dul ba gzhi/
69b6('dul ba): / bam po drug cu gcig pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi bud med la lhag par chags pas// glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnam
69b7('dul ba): su song nas/ mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon phyag pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spong che ba zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas zhes bya ba
70a1('dul ba): nas/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de dus gzhan zhig na/ chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo zong thogs nas sul gzhan du 'gro'o// des
70a2('dul ba): smras pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo // de yang kha zas zhim po dang gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/ rgyal po gzugs can
70a3('dul ba): snying po glang po che la zhon nas/ de'i khyim drung nas song ba dang / des kyang skar khur du 'dug nas/ rgyal po la me tog gi 'phreng ba bor ro// de nas rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ mar shog/ des smras
70a4('dul ba): pa/ lha ga yar che lags kyis/ khyod nyid nang du gshegs shig/ de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas/ de de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang
70a5('dul ba): ldan pas sems can chags par gyur nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de nas rgyal pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgya dang / seng ras khra bo byin nas
70a6('dul ba): smras pa/ gal te re zhig khye'ur gyur na seng ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya yang mgul du thogs te/ nga'i drung du sgri zhig/ 'on te bu mo yin na ni khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras nas
70a7('dul ba): rgyal po song ngo / / ji tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste/ rgyal po'i khab dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas/ des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig/ kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te/ zhag
70b1('dul ba): 'di tsam kho na na byin par 'ong ngo / / spring ba des thos nas/ bdag gis ni bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'o na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du 'phongs par gyur nas/ des de ltar gyur
70b2('dul ba): pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos slar spring ba/ bag mche bar 'dug cig/ ji nas kyang myur du mi 'ong ba de ltar ngas bya'o// rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba/ ded dpon
70b3('dul ba): nga la rin po che che ge mo dang che ge mo dag cig dgos kyis/ de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig/ de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo // de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas btsas pa dang /
70b4('dul ba): khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// ma bslabs kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pas/ des mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'grangs par bsnyod nas sor gdub
70b5('dul ba): kyi rgya mgul du btags te/ seng ras kyis dkris nas sgom bu'i nang du bcug ste/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bsgo ba/ song la sgrom bu 'di khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyod kyis dkyil
70b6('dul ba): 'khor byos la/ me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du snod cig/ des de bzhin du byas pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang bzad kyi gzhir song nas
70b7('dul ba): rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med dang lhan cig 'dug pa las/ des rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me mthong ngo // de nas zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi
71a1('dul ba): sgo na mar me 'bar ba 'o ni ci yin ltos shig/ de de dag gis bltas nas smras pa/ lha sgrom bu zhig mchis so// des smras pa long zhig/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs
71a2('dul ba): med kyis smras pa/ lha sgrom bu de na ci mchis pa de bdag la stsal bar ci gnang / rgyal pos de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so// ji tsam na sgrom bu blangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang / rgyal pos
71a3('dul ba): smras pa/ kha phye zhig/ kha phye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di ci gson nam/ 'on te shi ba zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gson lags so// de nas rgyal pos
71a4('dul ba): sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras ngo shes nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang / des de bsnun bsnyod bskyed de/ rgyal pos gson nam zhes tshig tu byung ba dang / rgyal bu gzho//
71a5('dul ba): nu 'jigs med kyis gsos pas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos zhes bya bar grags so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos chen por gyur to// de 'jigs med
71a6('dul ba): dang lhan cig bre mo gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med gzhon nu ma skyes dgra nI ma bcas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan gyis/ bdag cag ni bzo cung zad bslabs te/ des na
71a7('dul ba): bdag cag gi phyi dus kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/ shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gon pa/ mi gos dkar po gyon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal po'i pho
71b1('dul ba): brang du zhugs pa dang / de rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med des mthong nas/ des rgyal bu'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shing rta mkhan lags
71b2('dul ba): so/ / 'dis ci thob/ 'tsho ba'o// des bsams pa/ bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas/ shing rta mkhan bslab bo snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag kyang shing
71b3('dul ba): mkhan bslab bo/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod ci 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/ yab rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan slobs
71b4('dul ba): shig/ des bslab par brtsams so// 'tsho byed kyis kyang sman pa gos dkar po gon pa/ mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa mthong nas/ des
71b5('dul ba): gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ sman pa lags so// 'di ci zhig byed/ dpyad bgyid do// ci thob/ gal te nad pa zhig sos na rngan pa thob bo// 'on te gum na mi
71b6('dul ba): chol mi 'dri'o/ / des bsams pa/ sman dpyad bslab bo snyam nas/ de'i pha'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod cig/ sman dpyad bslab lags so// bu khyod rgyal po'i sras
71b7('dul ba): yin no/ / khyod la sman dpyad kyis ci bya/ lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad bslab par bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na slobs shig/ de sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang / des
72a1('dul ba): sman dpyad ni lobs na/ des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/ des rdo 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod do// des klad pa'i thod pa 'byed
72a2('dul ba): pa'i dpyad shes so zhes thos nas/ / de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha rdo 'jog tu mchi'o// ci zhig gi phyir/ de na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de klad pa'i thod
72a3('dul ba): ba 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bar de slob tu mchi'o/ / bu khyod 'dis 'tsho 'am/ lha yang na ni sman dpyad mi bslab/ yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o// bu gal te de lta na song zhig/ des rgyal
72a4('dul ba): po pad+ma'i snying po la spring ba/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gis/ 'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig/ de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i
72a5('dul ba): snying pos kyang spring yig bklags te rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas/ rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du ched du 'ongs kyis/ 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig/ rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa
72a6('dul ba): na/ des nyung zad bstan pa dang / 'tsho byed khyad par dang bcas par ldob bo// rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe nad pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ bram ze'i khye'u gcig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas/
72a7('dul ba): de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas/ des nad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang 'di dag byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo // 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni mkhan pos nyes te/
72b1('dul ba): gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni legs pa ma yin gyis/ thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/ de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung nas/
72b2('dul ba): slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung ngo // kho bos sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma byin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig/ des de bzhin du byas pas sos par gyur
72b3('dul ba): to/ / ji tsam na nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun shes kyi bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ na ba ji ltar sos par gyur te/ sang yang de nyid byin cig/ ci snga ma lags sam/ 'on te slad kyis bstan/
72b4('dul ba): ba lags/ ci bdag gis sngar bstan nam/ 'on te phyis bstan/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to// 'di ni 'tsho byed la 'phrin du spring ba yin no// des
72b5('dul ba): bsams pa/ bdag gis nyes kyis/ 'tshe byed ni shes rab can yin no snyam bsams nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byin cig/ rgyun shes kyi bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba
72b6('dul ba): skyes pas/ de gang du 'gro ba der 'tsho byed khrid do// bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni spro bar ston par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag la ni
72b7('dul ba): mi mdzad do/ / des smras pa/ 'tshe byed ni shes rab can yin pas/ ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi/ khyed kyis ni de lta ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/
73a1('dul ba): mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/ gal te de lta na ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o// des bram ze'i khye'u de rnams la khyod kyis ni rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin dris shig
73a2('dul ba): khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes thams cad tshong dus su btang ngo / / 'tsho byed kyang khyed kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes bsgo'o// bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin byas
73a3('dul ba): so/ / 'tsho byed kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsams pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na/ bdag gis ji skad brjod par byas/ thams cad du rdzas thams cad
73a4('dul ba): kyi rin dri'o snyam mo/ / de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song nas/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin smras so// rgyun shes kyi bus ma bstan pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri bar brtsams te/ bram ze'i khye'u rdzas
73a5('dul ba): che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa ma 'tshal lo// gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa ma 'tshal lags so// 'tsho byed la dris pa dang / des rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so// rgyun
73a6('dul ba): shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ thos lags so// ngas 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin te cu zad bstan na yang / de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nus so zhes
73a7('dul ba): smras pa ni don de yin no/ / gzhan yang mngon sum du bya'o zhes des/ de rnams la smras pa/ thang shing can gyi ri la deng la sman ma yin pa dag khyer te shog cig/ de dag dong nas de dag las gang
73b1('dul ba): zhig gis gang sman pa yin par shes pa de drug gisgra blangs so/ / 'tsho byed kyis bsnams pa/ sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/ des 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang /
73b2('dul ba): ba'i dum bu zhig blangs so// ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na phyogs rdzi mo zhig zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshung khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las/ de shin tu mig na ba des
73b3('dul ba): mthong nas des dris pa/ gang du 'gro ba des smras pa dang / des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa las/ des byas pa dang / mod la sos par gyur to// de dga' ba
73b4('dul ba): skyes nas smras pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum chud 'di khyod snoms shig/ des phrum tshud blangs te zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la byin nas/ de phrum chung khyer te song ba las/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u
73b5('dul ba): rnams kyis lam gyi dbus na glang po che'i rjes shig mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang / 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/ 'di ci yin/ glang po che'i
73b6('dul ba): rjes so/ / 'di ni glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyis/ 'di ni ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ de ring kho nar glang po'i phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la
73b7('dul ba): de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ snum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no// ji tsam na rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs nas/ gang
74a1('dul ba): gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to/ / rgyun shes kyi smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/ re zhig 'di ni cho ga che ge mo zhig
74a2('dul ba): gis nad che ge mo zhig yin la/ de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin no// 'tshe byed la dris pa/ khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mkhan po thams cad sman lags
74a3('dul ba): te/ sman ma lags pa ni ci yang ma mchis so// 'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu dang / phrum tshud cig 'tshal te mchis so// 'di dag ci dgos/ sdig
74a4('dul ba): pas zin pa la 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go/ phrum tshud kyis ni glan par bgyi'o// rdo'i dum bus ni ston ka'i dus na zho'i bum pa 'tshag par 'gyur ro// rgyun shes kyi bus
74a5('dul ba): 'dzum phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bsams pa/ mkhan po ni 'di la khros so snyam nam/ des rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po ci 'di gcig pur bas snyam mam/
74a6('dul ba): bdag cig mchi ba na lam gyi dbus su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas/ 'do na ba lang po'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba la sbrum pa/ de ring kho nar glang
74a7('dul ba): po'i phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// rgyun shes kyi bus
74b1('dul ba): dris pa/ 'tsho byed bden nam/ mkhan po med do// de glang po che'i rjes sam pa lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa
74b2('dul ba): lags na/ ji ste ma 'tshal/ glang po che'i rjes ni zlum mo// ba lang mo'i rjes ni chur ring ngo // mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa lags
74b3('dul ba): so/ / sbrum pa ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnon cing mchi ba las so// deng kho nar 'brang bar 'gyur ba ji ltar shes/ gcin be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so// glang po che'i phrug gu
74b4('dul ba): por 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchi bas so// de la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang pa'i bar du gcis pa las so// de yang mig
74b5('dul ba): g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su me tog thu zhing mchis pas so// de yang sbrum par ji ltar shes/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so// deng kho nar btsa'
74b6('dul ba): bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin ldan ljini dang bcas te 'byung ba las so// de lta lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na/ 'gron pa gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga'
74b7('dul ba): zhig mngag tu gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhi btang ba dang / 'tshe byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i /
75a1('dul ba): dag khyed kyis thos sam/ 'tsho byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can yin no// 'tsho byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bslabs so// ji tsaman
75a2('dul ba): mi zhig klang nad kyis thebs nas/ rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi bus bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje re zhig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon
75a3('dul ba): gyis shig dang / sang bdag gis khyed kyi dpyad bya'o// 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje bdag gis cung zad bslabs pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan
75a4('dul ba): pa'i phyir yin na/ bdag gis smad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslabs kyis/ khyod kyis bdag dbyen pa zhig tu zhog cig dang / khyod kyi las ji ltar byed pa blta'o// des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o//
75a5('dul ba): des de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag go/ de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas mi de dong du bcug ste/ thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phye nas/ des skam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams pa
75a6('dul ba): dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ mkhan po gzu lums su ma blang zhig/ rigs kyi bu 'di deng nyid du 'gum par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed 'ongs sam/ smras pa/ mkhan po
75a7('dul ba): ba dag mchis so/ / kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/ mkhan po skam pa tsha bar mdzod de/ rgyab tu reg nas rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang / de nas bor cig/ de des de
75b1('dul ba): bzhin du byas nas sos par gyur to/ / rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ 'tsho byed kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur gyis/ khyod khrus byos la shog cig dang / klang ba'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad sbyin no//
75b2('dul ba): de khrus byas nas 'ongs pa dang / des de la klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad byin nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyis/ yul 'dir khyod kyis ma bya zhig/ mkhan po
75b3('dul ba): de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas nas/ rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas/ bdag gis sman dpyad bslabs lags kyi mchi'o// de'i tshe
75b4('dul ba): rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa skye bsang zhes bya ba dag cig yod de/ des smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa skye bseng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyis
75b5('dul ba): 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas/ ro zhig de phob la phyis song zhig dang / de ltar na bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro// des de la khas blangs pa dang / de nas des
75b6('dul ba): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las/ de mtha' 'khob pa skya bsed de rnams phab nas/ gte'u bzung / dpya blangs te/ slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du
75b7('dul ba): rgyal po la phul ba dang / de shin tu dga' nas/ de nyid la rjes su yi rang ste/ des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la byin no// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas/ de nyid du dbyar gnas
76a1('dul ba): te/ de nas des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas/ grong khyer bzang byed nas chas pa dang / mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug
76a2('dul ba): pab/ rus pa dang pags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/ lus kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/ de la smras pa/ kye nang rje ci zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/ des smras pa
76a3('dul ba): bdag gis kyang mi shes na/ 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'di khyer nas/ bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur to// de shing brtag pa la byang ba yin pas smras pa/ kye nang rje
76a4('dul ba): ci shing khur 'di 'tshong ngam/ 'tshong ngo // rin ji tsam/ kar sha pa Na lnga brgya'o// des de nyos nas/ de nas bltas nas/ 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu mthong nas/
76a5('dul ba): de'i mthu ni 'di 'dra ste/ gang gi tshe nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe/ mar mes khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du/ nad ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo // de rim gyis yul u dum wa rang phyin pa dang /
76a6('dul ba): na mi bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bor gzhal nas/ bre mgo la bsnun pa 'tshe byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci'i phyir de ltar byed/ bdag gi klad pa lhag par g.ya' 'o// tshur/
76a7('dul ba): shog blta'o zhes des de bsnyal nas klad pa bltas te/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa'i nor bu de'i klad pa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / ji tsam na srin gyi med cig snang ngo //
76b1('dul ba): de nas des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyi klad pa la srin gyi med yod do// des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ des khas blangs so// 'tsho byed kyis
76b2('dul ba): bsams pa/ mkhan pos ji skad bstan pa bzhin 'di'i dpyang bya'o snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ kye nang rje re zhig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon byos shig dang / sang dpyad
76b3('dul ba): bya'o/ / des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo // 'tsho byed kyis de'i phyi de nyin 'ongs nas/ de dong du bcug ste klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis klad pa'i thod pa phye nas/ skam pa tsha
76b4('dul ba): bas srin gyi med kyi rgyab la reg par byas te/ des rkang lag 'khums pa dang / de nas des skam pas blangs te bor bas sos par gyur to// des de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des
76b5('dul ba): kyang rgyun shes kyis bu la bskur ro/ / de nas 'tsho byed yul ro hi ta ka zhes bya bar phyin pa dang / yul ro hi ta ka na khyim bdag cig la skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum/
76b6('dul ba): tshogs pa zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags pa las/ shi nas de nyid du mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes so// de'i bu ni khyim gyi dpon por gyur nas/ des skyed mos chel der srung ma'i
76b7('dul ba): mi bzhag pa dang / de mi ma yin pa des bsad do// gnyis pa bzhag pa dang de yang bsad nas/ khyim bdag gi bu des skyed mos tshal de bor ro// ji tsam na mi dmu chus gang ba sman pa thams
77a1('dul ba): cad kyis spangs pa zhig/ skyed mos tshal der song nas nub mo brang btab ste 'dug nas/ kye ma'o bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nyid du 'a
77a2('dul ba): byed kyang nub mo brang btab ste 'dug go/ ji tsam na mi ma yin pa des/ dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang / dmu chu'i nad de byung nas smras pa/ 'di bdag gis sngar bzung na ci'i phyir
77a3('dul ba): 'di bsdigs/ khyod la ra spu'i dud pas 'dug pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni khyod dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// des kyang sngar smras pa/ khyod la yang la phug gi sa bon
77a4('dul ba): mar phyang ba'i dar ba dang btags te sbyin pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni khyod du ma bu dum bur 'dzag par 'gyur ro// thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos nas/ de nang par sngar langs te khyim
77a5('dul ba): bdag de'i drung du song nas/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag skyed mos chel me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/ khyim bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa
77a6('dul ba): dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag ra spu'i dud pas bdugs shig dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gis ra spu'i bdug pas bdugs pa dang
77a7('dul ba): mi ma yin pa de dpag tshad bcu gnyis su bros par gyur to/ / khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed kyis
77b1('dul ba): dmu chu can la dris pa/ nang rje khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i skyed mos chel du 'dug/ des de la ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa dang / 'tshe byed kyis smras pa/ la phug
77b2('dul ba): gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags pa 'thungs shig dang / sos par 'gyur ro// des 'thungs nas sos par gyur te/ mi nges kyang 'tsho byed la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin no// des de
77b3('dul ba): yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ / de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom brlag tu phyin nas/ bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig gi drung du ngal bso zhing 'dug go/ ji ltar na gyad kyis gyad cig
77b4('dul ba): brdabs pas de'i nang khrol rnams 'khrugs nas de shi'o zhes phyi rol tu phyung ngo / / shing de la yang bya rgod mo phrug gu dang bcas pa zhig 'dug pa las/ de la phrug gu de rnams kyis smras pa/
77b5('dul ba): ma sha byin cig/ des smras pa/ bu sha ga la yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma gyad kyis gyad 'di brdabs te shi nas phyung ba yin no// bu 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs na/
77b6('dul ba): des 'di sos par byed pa'i gnas de yod do// ma 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/ gal te de'i nang khrol rnams phye mas rig par byas na'o// de thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos so//
77b7('dul ba): de nas de langs te ro drung du song nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gyad kyis gyad brdabs pas shi ba yin no// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ zhog
78a1('dul ba): cig dang blta'o/ / de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang / de na 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu klad par bzhag nas brtags na/
78a2('dul ba): nanang khrol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas/ des smyug ma'i sbubs su phye ma thugs te khas bus pa dang / phye mas nang khrol rnams la reg nas sos par gyur to// des kyang 'tsho
78a3('dul ba): khyed la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// bcom brlag na khyim bdag cig yod pa de'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ de de la
78a4('dul ba): lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las/ shi nas de nyid kyi so mtshan gyi srin bur skyes par gyur to// de gang dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa de shi bar byed do// de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig
78a5('dul ba): dga' dgur spyod par mi byed do/ / des sman pa 'tsho byed der 'ongs so zhes thos naso// de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'tsho byed bai dgo la bro nad mchis kyis dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis re
78a6('dul ba): mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas chags pas smras pa/ ngam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag dang ldan cig dga' dgur spyad ba ltan dbyung bya'o// des smras pa/ gas na lags so//
78a7('dul ba): des spras pa/ khyod kyi dpyad gzhan ni med do// bdag las 'phangs pa gzhan med pas des khas blangs so// de nas des sprin mor phyung ste/ babo cos byis nas so mtshan gyi go sha'i dum bu
78b1('dul ba): zhig bzhag pa las/ de nas srin bu de de la chags pa dang / des de blangs nas bor te/ sos par gyur to// de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhen pas brda zhig byas pa dang / des rna ba
78b2('dul ba): gnyis bkag ste smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i sring mo dang 'dra ste/ khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas kho bos de ltar byas par zad do// des kyang de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi
78b3('dul ba): bu la bkur ro/ / de nas 'tsho byed kyis rim gyis chu bo ya mun na'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / des de na mi ro zhig yod pa de'i rting pa'i phyogs na rgyus pa'i breng yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las
78b4('dul ba): de'i mig 'byed pa dang 'dzums pa mthong nas/ 'tsho byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/ ji ltar rgyus pa dang / long mo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs ni de kho na ltar 'dug go snyam nas
78b5('dul ba): rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin pa dang / ji tsam na byad kyis gyad cig thal mos bsnun pas mig gi 'bras bu 'phags pa dang / 'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/ des rting pa'i rgyus pa'i brang nas
78b6('dul ba): drangs pa dang / slar chud par gyur to// des de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no// yangs pa can na mi zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi med zhugs te/
78b7('dul ba): der de las phrug gu bdun brgya byung bas/ de rna ba'i nad kyis nyen par gyur nas/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sngar ni bdag
79a1('dul ba): gis mkhan pos bstan pa las byas kyis/ da ni rang gi blos byas so snyam nas/ des mi de la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje song la lo ma'i spyil po byos te ras sngon pos g.yog/
79a2('dul ba): la/ de'i 'og tu rnga zhig zhog ste sa yang dron por gyis shig/ des ji skad bstan pa bzhin thams cad byas so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi des la bsnyal nas/ sa de chus chag chag btab
79a3('dul ba): nas/ de nas rnga brdungs pa dang / srin gyi med kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab bo snyam nas phyir byung ngo // de nas 'tsho byed kyis rna ba'i drung du sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa dang / de yang slar zhugs te
79a4('dul ba): phrug gu rnams khrid de byung nas/ phrug gu rnams dang lhan cig sha'i dum bu la chags pa dang / de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la sha'i dum bu bor ba dang / mi des sos par gyur to// der kar
79a5('dul ba): sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no// de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed ji ltar 'ongs pa thos nas/ des
79a6('dul ba): gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/ bu khyod kyi phu bo 'ongs kyis bsur song zhig/ de bsur song ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ji ltar bsur 'ong ba thos nas/ des bsams
79a7('dul ba): gal te bdag gis de bsur ba rang gir byas na ni/ nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de slar log ste sgo gzhan zhig nas zhugs so// dus gzhan zhig
79b1('dul ba): na'atsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/ sems g.yeng zhing song ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste/ bdag la sman ston
79b2('dul ba): cig/ tshig pa zos nas smras pa/ thal bas thob cig/ des drang po zhig pas/ thal bas btab pa dang sos par gyur to// mig nad kyis thebs pa gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tsho byed
79b3('dul ba): kyi drung du song ba bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/ kye nang rje gang du 'gro/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod la 'tsho byed ci dgos/ des kho bo la gang bstan pa de byos
79b4('dul ba): shig/ de yid ches par gyur nas/ des thal ba btab pa dang long bar gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i spyi bor phol mig byung ngo // des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/
79b5('dul ba): shes ldan dag sman pa rnams khug cig/ blon po rnams kyis sman pa rnams bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i spyi bor phol mig byung gis dpyad byos shig/ de rnams
79b6('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ lha sman pa chen po 'tsho byed mchis na/ bdag cag gi bgyi ci 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khug cig/ de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras
79b7('dul ba): pa/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te lha la bdag nyid kyis khrus bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas 'tsho ba dkyis
80a1('dul ba): skyu ru ras skud cing smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nas/ smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs te/ gang gi tshe smin pa
80a2('dul ba): de'i tshe na ma tshor ba spu gris reg par byas pa dang rdol lo/ / de nas 'tshe bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nas/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang / ma
80a3('dul ba): de sos shing pags pa 'dra ba dang skra yang mnyam par gyur to/ / rgyal po khrus byas ma thag tu smras pa/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ des smras pa/ lha re zhig shos gsol cig/ rgyal pos zan
80a4('dul ba): zos nas/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ lha bgyis lags so// de yid ma ches nas lag pas byugs na phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma shes so// me long blangs te bltas na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo //
80a5('dul ba): btsun mo la dris na/ des kyang phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma shes so// rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang
80a6('dul ba): skur zhig/ mi long ba des smras pa/ lha ci sras la byams pas sam/ 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas pas so// des smras pa/ gal
80a7('dul ba): tede lta lags na/ 'dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis lags so// 'tshe byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag gis khyod mthong yang ma mthong na sos par lta ga la byas/ des smras pa de ni mang na//
80b1('dul ba): 'on kyang khyod kyis gang la bstan pa des bdag la bstan to// ci zhig bstan/ che ge mo zhig go// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ de'i khams kyang gzhan la/ khyod kyi khams kyang gzhan yin
80b2('dul ba): gyis/ da 'di dang 'di dag byos shig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des byas nas sos par gyur pa dang smras pa/ lha 'di sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/ de glang po che la
80b3('dul ba): zhon nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ / rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa skran gyi nad kyis thebs nas/ sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang / des
80b4('dul ba): bsams pa/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o// gal te dpyad cig byas na ni de lta na legs/ gal te ma byas na bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ de 'tsho byed kyi drung du song nas/ 'tsho byed bdag gi
80b5('dul ba): dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyi sman 'di ni rnyed par dka' 'o// des bsams pa/ 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs na/ 'di la ci byar yod/ dus la bab kyis bdag
80b6('dul ba): ni 'chi'o snyam nas/ de dur khrod du song ngo // de na ro sreg pa'i me 'bar ba'i ne'u le gdug pa zhig dang / srog chags go d+ha tsan dan zhes bya ba 'thabs te lhung ba dang / de bkres pas nyen
80b7('dul ba): pas de gnyis kar zos te/ lhas du bakhrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs nas/ dur khrod dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na gnag lngas yod pa der song ste/ ko dra'i chan dang mar phyung
81a1('dul ba): ba'i zho 'thungs pas skran rdol te yar slon mar 'khrus nas/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags ma'i 'doms kyi phyogs su bol
81a2('dul ba): mig byung ngo / / des rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos/ 'tsho byed la bsgo ba/ ma yar mo'i dpyad gyis shig/ des khas blangs so// de nas zan byas te/ ma ma la byin nas khyod kyis
81a3('dul ba): 'di'i steng du 'dug tu chug cig/ des de 'dug tu bcug pa'i zan 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsams pa/ phyogs che ge mo zhig na'o snyam mo// de nas smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste/
81a4('dul ba): smin par shes nas/ zan gyi nang du gtsags bu sbas te ma ma la bsgo ba/ khyod kyis de 'di la 'dug tu chug la/ btsun mo 'dug nas slar slongs shig/ des de bzhin byas pa las gtsigs pus
81a5('dul ba): reg ma thag tu phol mig rdol bar gyur to/ / de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dang bsres pa bska ba'i chus bkrus te/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams btab pas sos par gyur to// 'tsho byed rgyal
81a6('dul ba): po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed khyod kyis ma yar mo'i dpyang byas sam/ lha bgyis so// khyod kyis sgren mor phyung ste ma bltas grang / lha ma bltas so// ji ltar byas/ des ji ltar
81a7('dul ba): gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ 'tsho byed la lan gnyis su sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur zhig/ mi skran can la 'tsho byed kyis sman
81b1('dul ba): rnyed par dka' 'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa des smras pa/ lha ci sras la sdug pas sam/ 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas pas so//
81b2('dul ba): gal te de lta lags na/ 'dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis so// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rjengs khyod la dpyad ni ma byas kyi/ 'on kyang ngas khyod kyi sman ni rnyed par dka' 'o zhes smras
81b3('dul ba): so/ / des smras pa/ bdag gi sman ji lta bu dag cig yin/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ gal te zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la mi ser skya cig shi nas de dur khrod du sreg pa na ne'u le 'dug
81b4('dul ba): pa dang / srog chags go d+ha tsan dan 'thabs nas mer lhung ba dang / de gnyis khyod kyis zos la/ dbang phyug chen po'i lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs la/
81b5('dul ba): dra'i chan zos shing mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs na/ de lta na khyod mod la sos par 'gyur te/ bdag gis de las bsams nas sman rnyed par dka' 'o zhes smras pa yin no// des smras pa
81b6('dul ba): shin tu legs par shes te/ de bzhin du bdag gis zos so// de nas dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ lha 'dis sman pa'i rgyal po rngo thog gis/ dbang bskur bas dbang bskur du gsol/ lan gnyis
81b7('dul ba): su yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ / gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i grogs po lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra bslus nas/ bachos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral ba de'i tshe/ de la sman gyi nad kyi
82a1('dul ba): thebs par gyur to/ / des sman pa rnams la smras pa/ nga ba dpyad gyis shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha lha'i gcen po sman pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'i 'tsho byed 'di na
82a2('dul ba): mchis bzhin du/ bdag cag gis dpyad pa pyid rngog la thog/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khug cig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / 'tsho byed nga la skran gyi nad byung
82a3('dul ba): gi bdabyang byos shig/ lha bgyi'o// des bsams pa/ rgyu gnyis kyis skran rdol bar 'gyur te/ lhag par dga' ba 'am/ lhag par khros pas yin na/ sems can sdig pa byed pa 'di lhag
82a4('dul ba): par dga' bar ga la 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du khros par bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po'i sha gsol ba lta na dpyad
82a5('dul ba): bgyi'o/ / rgyal pos thos nas khros te smras pa/ legs so// ngas ni pha srog dang bral/ khyod kyis kyang 'char byed bzang po srog dang phral/ nga yang rang nyid nad kyis shi nas/ khyod ni rgyal por
82a6('dul ba): 'gyur mod/ des smras pa/ lha dpyad ni 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis sos par rngo mi thog go/ bdag dang 'dra ba'i phangs pa med pas des khas blangs so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu
82a7('dul ba): 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po la legs par gzigs pa de ltar mdzad du gsol/ phyis gzigs par mi 'gyur ro//
82b1('dul ba): de nas de bstan nas/ khyim du khrid nas bzhag go// de nas 'tsho byed sha'i don du bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba las/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod ni shi ba'i ros stong pa ma yin pas/ de
82b2('dul ba): nas des ro'i sha blangs te/ yo byad kyi khyad par dag dang g.yos byas nas/ rgyal po dro la bab pa'i dus su bstabs so// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras sha khu'i phor pa blangs nas za bar gzas pa
82b3('dul ba): dang / 'tsho byed kyis phrogs nas klad du bsnun te/ sdig pa byed pa khyod kyis pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po srog dang phral la/ dbu'i sha yang za bar byed dam/ de rngams nas smras pa/
82b4('dul ba): gal te de lta na ci'i phyir gsad ces mi bzod pa skyes pas/ de'i sman rdol nas yang smon mar 'khrus te/ kha nas khrag dang bcas par byung ba de mthong nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel lo// de nas chus
82b5('dul ba): gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang / khrus byas te 'phrod pa'i zas byin pas/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/
82b6('dul ba): khrid de rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis gtugs te smras pa/ lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po 'di lags te/ bdag srog chags grog slar yang srog dang 'bral bar bgyid mi phod na/
82b7('dul ba): gzhon nu lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang thabs 'dis lha 'tsho bar 'gyur bas/ bdag gis thabs bsham par bgyis par bas so// rgyal po mchog tu ngo mcher skyes nas/ des blon po
83a1('dul ba): rnams la bsgo ba/ 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur zhig/ blon po rnams kyis glang po che la bskyon nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan gsum du yang sman
83a2('dul ba): ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ / de nas 'tsho byed dregs pa skyes te/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i sman pa ni 'jig rten na 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni lus kyi dpyad byed pa
83a3('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog yin la/ bcom ldan 'das ni sems kyi dpyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no snyam mo// des dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba las// de grags
83a4('dul ba): pa'i bsnyems pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed na ci'i phyir bden pa rnams ma mthong bar gyur snyam na/
83a5('dul ba): grags pa'i bsnyems pa las gyur par gzigs nas/ de'i dregs pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho
83a6('dul ba): byed khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po gangs can mthong ngam/ btsun pa ma mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung zhig/ des bzung ba dang / de nas bcom
83a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed khrid nas/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / de na sman rnam pa sna tshogs sgron ma bzhin 'bar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
83b1('dul ba): sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'tsho byed sman ji tsam 'dod pa long zhig/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lags so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin
83b2('dul ba): lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje song la 'tsho byed la bsrung ba byos shig/ de dang song nas 'tsho byed la sman rnam pa sna tshogs dag blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
83b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed sman 'di ming ci yin/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das che ge mo lags te/ cho ga 'dis nad che ge mo zhig zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni che ge mo zhig lags te/
83b4('dul ba): nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan rnams kyi ming yang mi shes so// ma shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed 'di ni che ge mo ste/ cho ga
83b5('dul ba): che ge mos nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di yang che ge mo zhig ces bya'o// 'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sman dpad kyang mkhyen pa lta/ de na bcom ldan 'das
83b6('dul ba): kyis/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tshe byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa/ yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni rgyal po la 'os pa/ rgyal po la mgo ba/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su
83b7('dul ba): 'gro'o/ / 'dul ba gzhi// // bam po drug cu gnyis pa// / bzhi gang dag ce na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad la mkhas pa yin//
84a1('dul ba): nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin/ nad byung ba spang ba la mkhas pa yin/ spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ nad la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di
84a2('dul ba): la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes/ de ltar nad la mkhas pa yin no// nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa
84a3('dul ba): nad shes shing / nad 'di ni rlung gis kun nas bslang ba 'am/ mkhris pas kun nas bslang ba 'am/ bad kan gyis kun nas bslang ba 'am/ bdag las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan las gyur pa
84a4('dul ba): 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'o zhes/ de ltar nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin no// nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di
84a5('dul ba): ni mig sman nam/ bsku mnye 'am/ skyugs sman nam/ bkru sman nam/ snar blugs pa 'am/ du bas bdug pa 'am/ nan rtsi'i las kyis spong bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de ltar na dbyung ba
84a6('dul ba): spong ba la mkhas pa yin no/ / nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nang shes shing / nad 'di ni 'phrod pa'i cho ga 'di lta bu dag byas te spangs na
84a7('dul ba): phyis mi 'byung ngo zhes/ de ltar nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de ltar na sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa/ rgyal po la 'os pa yin/ rgyal po la ma'o//
84b1('dul ba): ba yin/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa yang sman pa zug rngu
84b2('dul ba): 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ / 'tsho byed bzhi gang dag ce na/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o//
84b3('dul ba): zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden
84b4('dul ba): pa'o zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'tsho byed smran pa zug rngu 'byin pas ni skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so// rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
84b5('dul ba): mya ngan dang / smra sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so// 'tsho byed de bzhin gshegs pas ni
84b6('dul ba): skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sag bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen no/ / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang
84b7('dul ba): 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen no/ / de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes
85a1('dul ba): bya'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed/
85a2('dul ba): kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis
85a3('dul ba): mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
85a4('dul ba): btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun
85a5('dul ba): la skyabs su mchi na/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tshe/
85a6('dul ba): byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // ri'i rgyal po gangs can kha bas yog ste rtag tu lhags pa che bas/
85a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyi snyun gyis thebs pa dang / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba bzhin/ bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan
85b1('dul ba): 'das la rim gro bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas 'tsho byed kyis me tog ut+pa la sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / bkru sman gyi rdzas dag sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams shangs
85b2('dul ba): kyis bsnam du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnams pa las thang sum cu rtsa gnyis kho na 'khrus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ga la legs par
85b3('dul ba): 'khrus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed skyon gang dag g.yos la ma 'khrus pa de dag kyang yod/ 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod/ 'khrus la g.yos pa yang yod//
85b4('dul ba): ma 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod do// 'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na bu ram dang a ru ra gsol la/ khu ba'i rim pa yang mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de
85b5('dul ba): bzhin du mdzad nas snyun gdangs par gyur to/ / 'tsho byed kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/ blon po gang su'i dpyad byas kyang rung ste/ des de la grong ngam/ grong mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// ji tsam
85b6('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/ 'tsho byed kyis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dpyad byas pa las/ des de la brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che zhig byin pa dang / des de blangs pa nas bcom ldan 'das grangan
85b7('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis/
86a1('dul ba): / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/ blon po gang su'i dpyad bgyis kyang rung ste/ des bdag la grong ngam/
86a2('dul ba): grong mchog stsol ba lags pas/ bdag gi lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la dpyad bgyis pa dang / des bdag la brgya stong ri ba'i ras shig stsal ba 'di bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'bul zhing mchis
86a3('dul ba): na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed las brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che bzhes so// de'i tshe tshe dang
86a4('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal/
86a5('dul ba): pa/ kun dga' bo brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che long la/ nga'i ched du gris dros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te/ sa phyogs gsal ba yangs par song nas
86a6('dul ba): gzhal bar brtsams pa las/ chos gos mang du ldang bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' chos gos gsum dang / bdag nyid kyi bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa dang / tshe
86a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ral cung dpung chang gcig byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gyi gnas der ras lnga brgya brnyes shing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang du ma zhig rnyed na/ dge slong
86b1('dul ba): rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ma shes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/
86b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos gris dras te/ kha dog dam par byas pa bcang bar bya'o// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las
86b3('dul ba): babs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa yin no/ / de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byed du song ba las/ ji tsam na lam gyi dbus
86b4('dul ba): nas 'tsho ba pa zhig mthong nas/ de de la gus pa bskyed de/ glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so// de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa/ lha ni dge slong 'ba'
86b5('dul ba): zhig la mngon par dad pa ma yin no/ / dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa ni gdon mi za bar lhas dge slong yin snyam ste/ de gus pas glang po che las babs nas/ rkang pa gnyis
86b6('dul ba): la gtugs so snyam nas/ de rnams yid gnyis su gyur te/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lhas su la phyag bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la'o// lha de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
86b7('dul ba): ma lags te/ 'tsho ba pa lags so// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi don 'di kho na gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
87a1('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo/
87a2('dul ba): sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che la babs nas/ de'i
87a3('dul ba): rkang pa la phyag bgyid pa lags pa las/ de ring bdag gus pa skyes nas glang po che las babs te dge slong lags snyam nas 'tsho ba pa'i rkang pa la gtugs lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan
87a4('dul ba): 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan ma cung zad cig gdab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la ca
87a5('dul ba): mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song
