116a4('dul ba): da ltar yang 'dis gcir bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo // yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
116a5('dul ba): btsun pa bdag sgra 'bral bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'dreg par rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod sgra 'bal/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ skra 'bal
116a6('dul ba): ba 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no/ / de lta bas na dge slong gis sba 'bal bar mi bya'o// 'bal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
116a7('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no zhes bya ba nas
116b1('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag bla gos mthang gos dang bcas/
116b2('dul ba): bas 'tsho bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed
116b3('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong gis bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o/ / 'tsho bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gi/ bcom ldan 'das la
116b4('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag ga yang gzhi 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas
116b5('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos
116b6('dul ba): gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
116b7('dul ba): bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag pa char 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu
117a1('dul ba): gti mug 'di lta ste/ pa char 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/
117a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni khyim pa 'chang bar byed do//
117a3('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong gis/ chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de bzhin du thams cad sar
117a4('dul ba): ba 'am/ thams cad dmar ba 'am/ dkar ba ni rung ba ma yin pa nyid do// sdom la/ kha cher ring dang gdengs ka dang // ral ka gtsug tor thod dang ni// ra bal gos dang tra
117a5('dul ba): ba la klam/ / mchin nad kun dga' mthang gos bcas// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos gos
117a6('dul ba): 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang
117a7('dul ba): dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha cher gdengs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
117b1('dul ba): skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
117b2('dul ba): skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag ral ka 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal
117b3('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo//
117b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig
117b5('dul ba): gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag thod 'ching bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no/
117b6('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ra bal gyi gos
117b7('dul ba): bcang bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
118a1('dul ba): bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rdza bal gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
118a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin
118a3('dul ba): nad can dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ snam sbyar med par de phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de'i snam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/
118a4('dul ba): de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca' zhing / snam sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi
118a5('dul ba): bya'o/ / song na 'gal tshabs can tu 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can na ba'i de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las char bab pa dang / de snam slar gyon te
118a6('dul ba): 'gro ba'i spro ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos dang bla gos su bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang snam sbyar gzhag tu rung ba ni lnga ste/ dge slong dang
118a7('dul ba): bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa dang / char bab pa 'am/ char 'bab tu dogs pa dang / 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun
118b1('dul ba): gyi gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o/ / bar sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dbyur dang dge tshul nyid dag gi/ byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni// rnyed pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang // dge 'dun
118b2('dul ba): rnyed dang de de yin/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs
118b3('dul ba): rgyur dong ba dang / de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir/ dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o// ma bcol
118b4('dul ba): ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o//
118b5('dul ba): blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad mnod par bya'o//
118b6('dul ba): dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyi mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o// dge slong dag rnyed
118b7('dul ba): pa chung ngu dag 'gyed par byed pa ni/ rnyed pa chung ngu yin no snyam nas dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o//
119a1('dul ba): gzhan dag gis ma bcol bar dong ba dang / de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
119a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// rnyed pa chung ngu gzhan dag bgor mchog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug
119a3('dul ba): lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcol bas rnyed pa chung ngu ma blangs na/ ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni nges par brnga bar bya'o// ri bor zhig/
119a4('dul ba): na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ de na gal te dge slong brgya gnas na ras yug brgya 'bul lo// de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug
119a5('dul ba): brgya kho na 'bul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa las/ khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur
119a6('dul ba): ba/ de gnyis kyis blangs nas phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/ rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro// cig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na yir 'gyur ro// gal te
119a7('dul ba): de lta na long zhig/ des smras pa/ phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang / ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs nas/ de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/
119b1('dul ba): gcig gis smras pa/ dge slong rnams bos la de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o// cig shos kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du byas na su 'gro/ gang gzhon pa'o// gos rnams sus
119b2('dul ba): srung / gang gzhon pas so// de ltar mi nus kyis/ gang gzhon pa ni 'gro'o// gang rgan pa des ni gos rnams srung ngo // de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon pa shos dge slong rnams 'bod
119b3('dul ba): pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo / / drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal sgo re mos re mos mi stongs par byed pa yin pas/ nye dga' rgyal
119b4('dul ba): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nas 'dug pa des rgyang ring po kho na nas mgo smra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/ smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig
119b5('dul ba): 'ong gis/ de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas/ gnas brtan byon pa legs so// byon pa legs so// slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo// des bsams pa/ 'di ni slob dpon yang
119b6('dul ba): mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni rgan zhugs shig yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri bor che ge mo zhig nas so// ci de na gtsug
119b7('dul ba): lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do// ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/ 'on te 'phongs pa yin/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs
120a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro/ / gal te de lta na pa kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o// slob dpon legs so// nye dgas bsams pa/
120a2('dul ba): gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan du song na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/ legs par bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas des de ngal sor bcug ste/ dus ma yin pa'i
120a3('dul ba): btung ba dag blud nas/ ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis nam sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te/ rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba byin nas/ ji tsam gnyid
120a4('dul ba): log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do/ / de nas nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das par byas so// de nas de nang par sngar langs te rgan zhugs
120a5('dul ba): de khrid nas rings par song ste/ rim gyis ri bor du phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang du gnas pa'i rgan zhugs cig shos des 'ongs pa legs so zhes kun dga' bar 'gyur
120a6('dul ba): ba'i tshig smras nas/ de gnyis ngal sos pa dang / khong gsum car yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas/ nye dgas smras pa/ rnyed pa bgos shig/ gnas brtan bgo'o//
120a7('dul ba): nye dgas rgan zhugs shig la smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ gnas brtan bdag mi bgod de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // cig shos la yang
120b1('dul ba): smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ khyed ni nyes pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni spyi'u tshugs su sems can
120b2('dul ba): dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ nye dgas bsams pa/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis sdong gis dbyen bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po
120b3('dul ba): mthong nas/ gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis gtsug lag khang dag tu rtag tu chag chag btab/ phyag bdar dang
120b4('dul ba): ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so/ / rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag bdar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob na lta/ nye dga' gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag bdar bya'o//
120b5('dul ba): 'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ rgan zhugs cig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas/ chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba
120b6('dul ba): dang ldan par gyur te/ des na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de gnang la phab pas skyongs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas cig shes
120b7('dul ba): kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis 'dir dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas so// rgan zhugs pal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed
121a1('dul ba): pa thob na ste/ nye dgas 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyam pa dus thams cad du chos bshad do// rnyed pa gang cung zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs
121a2('dul ba): cig shos de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang / phyag bdar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag bdar byed pa la yon tan lnga
121a3('dul ba): yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
121a4('dul ba): sogs par 'gyur pa dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de lta bas na gtsug lag khang phyag bdar byas pas yon bdag
121a5('dul ba): mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas/ de ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o//
121a6('dul ba): de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs
121a7('dul ba): ba'i thabs gzhan yon pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o/ / de gnyis kyis sngar sma phab pas smras pa/ gnas brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/
121b1('dul ba): cha gnyis kyi bar ni rang nyid 'dug go// de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha gcig bzhag nas gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs khyed gnyis nyon cig/ khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig/ 'di gnyis
121b2('dul ba): dang kho bo gcig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// de nas cha gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangs so// cha gcig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/
121b3('dul ba): gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig/ des bgo bar brtsams nas/ de na ras yug cig kha 'khyer du 'dug pa de
121b4('dul ba): yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo / / de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis su zhig
121b5('dul ba): shi ba mthong / des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so//
121b6('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams gzhan rnyed pa la
121b7('dul ba): thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the
122a1('dul ba): com skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus
122a2('dul ba): ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyon cig/ dge
122a3('dul ba): slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na/ sram gnyis shig gnas pa las/ de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la them par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshe skam la dong ba de'i
122a4('dul ba): tshe chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad kyang ma rnyed do/ / de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o// cig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin
122a5('dul ba): pa de ni spyir bya'o/ / de na gcig ni chur song ngo // cig shos ni skam la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bsgrogs te skam la bton nas/ de rnams skam la gnas
122a6('dul ba): bas bsad do/ / chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so// ji tsam na nya'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang / gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyis bgos shig/ cig shos kyis smras
122a7('dul ba): ba/ bdag mi 'gyed do// ci'i phyir bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis sems khongs su chud
122b1('dul ba): cing 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba/ de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas/ des smras pa/ tsha bo dag ci ste sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ nang po dag bdag
122b2('dul ba): cag ni nya rnyed pas so/ / ci ste mi 'byed/ zhang po nyes pas 'jigs so// khyed ni nyes pas 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur
122b3('dul ba): bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis sdong gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa rus sbal zhig mthong nas/ gcig gi drung
122b4('dul ba): du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag chur zhugs te/ bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams bsgrogs te skam la thon pa dang 'dis bsad do// tsha bo gal te chur
122b5('dul ba): zhugs pas cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o// skam la 'gro ba ni sdong dum gyi 'jigs pa dang / tsher ma'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa dang /
122b6('dul ba): mi'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bsad na/ khyod kyis bsgrogs kyang ci phan/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni
122b7('dul ba): de'i mthu yin pas/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khar bar mi bya'o// de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras
123a1('dul ba): pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste/ bdag gis skam la thon pa'i nya rnams bsad do// che bo gal te skam la song nas
123a2('dul ba): cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o// chur 'gro ba'i de dba' glong gi 'jigs pa dang / rus sbal gyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyi 'jigs pa dang / tsu
123a3('dul ba): srin kum bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bsgrogs na khyod kyis ji ltar gsad/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu
123a4('dul ba): yin pas/ des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// bzhin rgyas kyi smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshigs
123a5('dul ba): su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do// de sngar sma phab pas spras pa/ zhang po ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos
123a6('dul ba): te/ nya'i mjug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ bar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste/
123a7('dul ba): gting du rgyu bas mgo bo'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa// de ni chos la gnas pas bkur// bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan na/
123b1('dul ba): snyam nas/ des nya chen po zhig gi sked pa khyer te/ ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/
123b2('dul ba): mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i// nya bo che zhig thogs nas ni// shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs// des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing // chos dang chos min mi shes
123b3('dul ba): pas/ / rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar// des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur// des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ rgyas pa blta na sdug pa khyod// pha rol gnan pa
123b4('dul ba): shin tu legs/ / de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la// khyod kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dag
123b5('dul ba): 'di nyid yin no/ / sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la/ da ltar yang de gnyis bslus so//
123b6('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// khyim
123b7('dul ba): bdag de'i blo skyes pa/ ras yug brgya bsgrubs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// ji tsam na
124a1('dul ba): nye dgas khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams
124a2('dul ba): pa/ gal te de las ras yug gcig ma grub na/ bdag nye dga' ma yin no snyam nas/ de mgron du ma bos bzhin du song ngo // khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod
124a3('dul ba): gsol nas/ ras rnams 'grim pa dang / nye dgas ras gcig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags
124a4('dul ba): pa dag bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te 'tshal te mchis na/ 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/
124a5('dul ba): khyim bdag de ltar su zhig byed/ 'on kyang btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan ma drangs so// des ras de khyer nas song ngo // de nas khyim
124a6('dul ba): bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge
124a7('dul ba): slong dag mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na
124b1('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa
124b2('dul ba): dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus
124b3('dul ba): na yang nye dgas mgron du ma bos pas gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod de/ des bram ze'i khye'u
124b4('dul ba): brgya zla ba gsum du mgron du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bram ze rgan po zhig gan+da
124b5('dul ba): pa des thos nas/ de rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo // bram zes ras rnams 'drim par byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gi ras
124b6('dul ba): chad nas des dris pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na/ bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams
124b7('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid/ 'on kyang khyod kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bos sam/ bdag gis mgron du ma bos so// des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song ngo // bram ze
125a1('dul ba): des smad par brtsams so/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang de mgron du ma
125a2('dul ba): bos so/ / da lta na yang ngo // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ der dge slong zhig dbyar
125a3('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de ldang ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag bdar byed do// gtsug lag khang de ni sa phyogs
125a4('dul ba): dben zhing bzang ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad
125a5('dul ba): 'byin pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// ji tsam na ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug
125a6('dul ba): lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas/ de nang par
125a7('dul ba): sngar langs te song ngo / / dge slong de 'dzem bag can zhig pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
125b1('dul ba): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis pa'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang / der gal te
125b2('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung ngu 'am/ phal mo cher phul na/ de na gnas pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho
125b3('dul ba): na'i ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sdom la/ bye ba rnams la skal ba ni// sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las// dge 'dun dang ni chos gos kyi// rnyed pa brgyad du bya ba'o//
125b4('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar gyur na/
125b5('dul ba): rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ TI stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ chos
125b6('dul ba): dang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o/ / btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed pa sprul bar bgyi 'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig
125b7('dul ba): pa ni sbyin no/ / kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur sa rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/
126a1('dul ba): rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim
126a2('dul ba): bdag cig yod pa des yod byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang / khyim bdag
126a3('dul ba): des zas byin nas/ ras yug lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song so// ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang /
126a4('dul ba): drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las ri bor de nyid du phyin nas/ khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas/ ras yug lnga brgya byin no// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa
126a5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi mkhan pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyis/ de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro// /
126a6('dul ba): de gnyis kyis smras pa/ mkhan po ni bsod nams che ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ des lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do// de rnams kyis slar lan blan par brtsams
126a7('dul ba): pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang
126b1('dul ba): zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / dge 'dun gyir btags pa dang / dge slong gir btags pa dang /
126b2('dul ba): dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang / so sor bstan pa'o// mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas nyid la/ gso sbyong gcig la ste/ gtsug lag
126b3('dul ba): khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no// de la gnyug mar nas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya
126b4('dul ba): la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/ / de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin te/ gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas
126b5('dul ba): pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs smad par bya ste/ 'di ni mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis
126b6('dul ba): 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/ kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/ lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo ni spyi'i
126b7('dul ba): yin no zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam
127a1('dul ba): ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar
127a2('dul ba): 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu
127a3('dul ba): drangs la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// 'dul ba gzhi//
127a4('dul ba): bam po re lnga pa// // dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam

127b3('dul ba): pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa'i rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/

128a1('dul ba): gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o/ / gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis lam po che dang / tshong dus

128b1('dul ba): gnyis ka'o/ / lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa

128b4('dul ba): ka'o/ / lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mtha' logs su

129a1('dul ba): / phul la/ rgan pa'i mtha' nyid durgyu drangs nA/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhen/ gnyis ka'o// ji sa dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du/
129a2('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning gang la
129a3('dul ba): brten te/ dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni/ de kho na'i yin te/ 'di ni rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun gyir btags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na//
129a4('dul ba): rnyed pa gang zhig nges la/ dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyir btags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge slong gir btags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la
129a5('dul ba): dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i 'o/ / yang thog pa'i 'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o zhes btags pa ni/ de na dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir btags
129a6('dul ba): pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ / dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste/ 'di ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// mngon
129a7('dul ba): sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges la/ dmigs kyis ma phye ba'i ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bltam
129b1('dul ba): pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor po dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'dus pa la phul ba / gal te mchod rten chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na/ mchod rten gcig kho dal/
129b2('dul ba): dbul gyi/ gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// sdom la/ gnas nas phyung ba shi ba dang // bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang // gnas nas
129b3('dul ba): phyung dang dge tshul dang / / dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun
129b4('dul ba): pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang
129b5('dul ba): par 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas
129b6('dul ba): phyung ba zhig gum na/ de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni
129b7('dul ba): nyung ba las/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas
130a1('dul ba): phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar
130a2('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum
130a3('dul ba): lags na/ gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas par cig shos so// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni gcig mchis pa la
130a4('dul ba): gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas phyung ba rnams las thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge
130a5('dul ba): tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis/ de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams
130a6('dul ba): 'god par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas 'god par byed na/ ma bgos pa
130a7('dul ba): nyes par bgos pa yin no/ / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di
130b1('dul ba): skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma byung bar shin/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi
130b2('dul ba): yis/ de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'bye
130b3('dul ba): par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/
130b4('dul ba): legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs
130b5('dul ba): pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// /
130b6('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge
130b7('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag
131a1('dul ba): bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid du shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la 'a khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs
131a2('dul ba): par spyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces ponya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcwa
131a3('dul ba): pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
131a4('dul ba): la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams
131a5('dul ba): la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dmam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no//
131a6('dul ba): dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'byed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la
131a7('dul ba): sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par
131b1('dul ba): bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung ba shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o//
131b2('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres
131b3('dul ba): te 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa
131b4('dul ba): rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs te shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos
131b5('dul ba): gos long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ / dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas po rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs
131b6('dul ba): par bgos pa yin no/ / bsres te 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam
131b7('dul ba): ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes smras las de yang ma byang bar shin/ dam ma
132a1('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam
132a2('dul ba): ma bcas pa rnams 'byed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'gyed par byed
132a3('dul ba): na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// sdom ni nye dga' dang ni byin gyis
132a4('dul ba): brlabs/ / par ma sbyin dang bslang bya dang // bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang // spang ba dang ni mi gsum mo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// nye dga' spyi bor phol mig cig
132a5('dul ba): byung nas/ / de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin bzangs kho bo la sman ston cig/ des smras pa// 'phags pa mar khu gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// nye dgas bsams pa/ gal te
132a6('dul ba): de ring kho na 'thungs na/ de ring nyid du sos par gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re zhig bslangs la phyi nas btung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du shes na/ bsod
132a7('dul ba): nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kun tu mngag pa dang / de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang / rma g.yog pa gos phal mo che brangs so// phyi de nyin par sman
132b1('dul ba): bas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod spyan gdangs sam/ khyod kyis mar gsol lam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis
132b2('dul ba): deng nyis 'gyur du gsol cig/ des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po thos lags so// kho bo'i nad 'di ni cher
132b3('dul ba): skyes par gyur te/ mar dang rma g.yog pa'i gos mang du dgos kyis slongs shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal mo che bslangs so// de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas/ nyi ma
132b4('dul ba): de la yang ma 'thungs pas/ de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa mar gsol lam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so//
132b5('dul ba): 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs de ring ni sum gyur du btung ngo // sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang nu nub par zhugs
132b6('dul ba): kyang du ni khyod la srog ma mchis so/ / des smras pa/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul ba rdog pas mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyur ro// sman pa des mjal to zhes byas
132b7('dul ba): nas khros te song ngo / / de nas nye dgas mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las ma zhu nas shi'o// de nas gser mang du yod de/ cha gcig ni chos gos las so// cha gnyis pa
133a1('dul ba): ni nad kyi rkyen sman las so/ / cha gsum pa ni rdungs su byas pa dang ma byas pa las te/ gser srang sum khri byung ngo zhes blon po rnams kyis zos nas rgyal po la spras pa
133a2('dul ba): lha 'phags pa nye dga' gum pa las/ de la gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri mchis kyis/ de la bka' stsal pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa// gal te de lta na
133a3('dul ba): deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob cig/ dge slong rnams de khyer te sreg tu song ngo // de rnams kyang ljags nas gnas khang rgyas btab bo// dge slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bsregs
133a4('dul ba): nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan
133a5('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song ya nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rdul la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la 'di skad ces
133a6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi dge slong nye dga' la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag ma gtong ba 'am/ bag ma len pa de'i tshe
133a7('dul ba): dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/ 'on te na pa
133b1('dul ba): na rim gro byas sam zhes gyis shig/ gal te ma bgyis so zhes smra na/ de la rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus
133b2('dul ba): gnas par gyis shig/ rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas gtogs 'dod thong zhig ces smros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa
133b3('dul ba): kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyam nas/ ko sa li'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa
133b4('dul ba): btsun pa kun dga' bo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal ba bzhin du bgyi ste/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan
133b5('dul ba): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slo dga' shi ba'i yo byad
133b6('dul ba): bgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyug ste bsgyur nas bgos so// gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas/ de la gser mang du byung stegs
133b7('dul ba): srang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis bgos so zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par
134a1('dul ba): spyod pa yin pas/ bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so//
134a2('dul ba): yangs pa can dang / wA rA NA si pa dang / rgyal po'i kham pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas
134a3('dul ba): pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so/ / dge slong rnams sdud cing 'gyed pa na/ lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
134a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ gaN+DI dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten
134a5('dul ba): dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni gsol ba'o// shi ba'i gaN+DI de rdung pa na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyun chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang
134a6('dul ba): tshul shing 'grim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang byas
134a7('dul ba): te gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge slong
134b1('dul ba): gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol ba bya'o/ / dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum sde/ gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba
134b2('dul ba): dang mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga'
134b3('dul ba): gum pa'i yo byad rdzas gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlang pa'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste
134b4('dul ba): gsol ba'o/ / gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no// tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
134b5('dul ba): btsun pa gang na dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol bar bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi 'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor thog ma dang tha mar byas nas
134b6('dul ba): bgo bar bya'o/ / dge slong rnams kyis thog ma pa dang tha ma ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo byad cig sbyar te de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun
134b7('dul ba): gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gsol ba 'am thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar
135a1('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa
135a2('dul ba): nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os
135a3('dul ba): par chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du bsnun pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes
135a4('dul ba): bzhin du song nas/ rngon pa de srog dang bral lo// ji tsam na ma stes te/ chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri 'or zhig bcom nas phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo // mu ge dang
135a5('dul ba): bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sha 'di rnyed kyis nyis brgya lnga bcu'i ni glang po che'i sha bcad la bco'o// nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu blang ngo // de na glang po che'i
135a6('dul ba): sha bcad cing 'chad pa gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis/ de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin
135a7('dul ba): sha las ci yog pa zos la/ lhag ma dug gis gdab bo// de dag gis sha dug can zos dang 'chi bas kun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas lhag ma dug gis
135b1('dul ba): btab bo/ / gang dag chu la dong ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du dpyad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs nas/ lhag mjug blugs te 'ongs nas/ gang dag gis ni sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang
135b2('dul ba): chu 'thungs nas/ gang dag gis chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to// ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas/ phyogs der 'ongs nas
135b3('dul ba): des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo / / de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la rnyed pa phal mo cha yod kyis rim bzhin du bya'o snyam nas/ des gzhu mchog khar bcug
135b4('dul ba): gzhu rgyud kyi rtod pa rgyus pa bca' brtsams te/ de nas rgyus pa chod pa dang mchog mas dkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to// lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ bsags par yang ni bya ba ste/
135b5('dul ba): lhag par bsags par mi bya'o// sogs la chags pa'i wa long ba// gzhu yis bsad par gyur la ltos// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni nye
135b6('dul ba): dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang lhag par chags pas shi'o// da ltar yang lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebras
135b7('dul ba): sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de/ dge slong gis rim gro byas na/ 'on kyang shi bar gyur nas/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de nas chos gos cig
136a1('dul ba): bshang gcig dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to/ / de nas gos 'gyed pas/ rim gro byed pa de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyud ngan byas
136a2('dul ba): te/ chos gos ma bkrus kyis khrus shig/ des smras pa/ yod byed ni khyod 'gyed na/ kho bos bkru 'am/ khyod kyis khrus shig/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
136a3('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la/ lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o// gal te nad g.yog mang bar gyur pa thams cad kyi spyir yo byad
136a4('dul ba): drug bgo bar bya'o/ / dge slong shes nyen dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi nas/ de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul gyi yo byad dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i
136a5('dul ba): mthar spungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// zhes des 'dams shing 'dams shing bzang po rnams blangs so// bcom
136a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las sbyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin
136a7('dul ba): par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bar ma dag las sbyin par bya'o// nad pa mtshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog
136b1('dul ba): gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar brtag par bya'o// de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bsnyal bar bya'o//
136b2('dul ba): gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas/ dge slong zhig la smras pa/ re zhig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim
136b3('dul ba): gro gyis shig/ kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig/ des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las ji tsam na dge slong de shi'o// de nas gos 'gyed pas/
136b4('dul ba): de la smras pa/ dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgod dgos kyis phul cig/ des smras pa/ des kho bo kho na la ci bder byed du bcug go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
136b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de gson po'i tshe nyid na ma byin na/ shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di'i
136b6('dul ba): yin no zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang gi skal pa sbyin par bya'o/ / de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug bsngal ba nang tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de shes
136b7('dul ba): bachung bas de'i sman med nas/ de'i lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags te rim gro byed pa la spras pa/ bdag la ci yang med kyis/ bdag gi ched du mchod pa gyis shig/ des khas blangs pa las/
137a1('dul ba): de shi nas ngan song rnams su skyes so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim gro byed pa la ji
137a2('dul ba): skad smras/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / dge slong dag dge slong de log par srung ngo // gal te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas
137a3('dul ba): par gyur dang / dad pa skyes pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod po na/ nam yang yal bar mi gzhag ste// nad g.yog
137a4('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o/ / des de la dris te/ gal te de la sman med na yon bdag la bslang bar bya'o// gal te grub na de lta na legs/ ji ste ma grub na 'dun gyi las sbyin no// ji ste yang ma grub na
137a5('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ zi gtsang khang gi gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ rgyun gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyis phog la sbyin par bya zhing / rim gro byed pas bsgyur
137a6('dul ba): nas rim gro dang ston pa mchod par bya'o/ / sos par gyur nas la 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te/ khyod kyi yo byad du spyad do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te de la 'byor pa yod na des 'bad de bsab
137a7('dul ba): par bya'o/ / gal te med na de'i spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/ ba'i labu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong nad kyis
137b1('dul ba): thebs pa sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che ba/ tshor bas nyen pa zhig yod pa de lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ kho bo'i ltung
137b2('dul ba): bzed 'on cig/ des ma byin pa dang / de de la ngan sems skyes shing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pas shi nas/ de lhung bzed de nyid du sprul zhig tu skyes so// dge slong rnams kyis de
137b3('dul ba): sreg tu khyer nas/ bsregs te gtsug lag khang du lhags nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so// gos 'gyed pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar spungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
137b4('dul ba): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong sus kyang de'i lhung bzed bzhag pa'i snod ma dbye zhig/ de bzhin gshegs
137b5('dul ba): pa nyid kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phye ba dang / sbrul zhig mge'i bdengs ka cher byas

144b1('dul ba): to/ / de nas lam gyi dub pa ngal sos nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi snyun nad 'di ci//

144b3('dul ba): thob na/ des na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas/ sgo gar bsdad do// rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni slong ba po'i skye bo sgron du bzhug pa'i phyir/ sgor rgyun du rjes
144b4('dul ba): 'dogs te/ gang gi tshe slong ba po sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe de dkrol bar byed do// ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dril de dkrol lo// de nas rgyal po'i bus/ pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab yus slong
144b5('dul ba): ba zhig mchis kyis/ ci zhig slong smros shig/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis su rdzas rnams bsags te/ btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re zhig 'thung zhig dang /
144b6('dul ba): phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba rma'o// de ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su gyur pa dag byas nas mar 'thung bar 'dod na/ slong ba po'i skye bo'i ri bas lus
144b7('dul ba): kyi gnang du loganas/ mar de ba 'thungs par smras pa/ yab sum re zhig slong ba po nang dus bkug gi bar du mi 'tshal lo// rgyal pos slob la bsgo ba/ spong ba po nang du bong zhig/ de na
145a1('dul ba): du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po'i bus lus mdzes pa dang / sems dang ba dang / spyod lam zhibs zhugs pa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci zhig bzhed/
145a2('dul ba): des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa bcud ni khyod kho na la 'os kyi/ bdag la ma lags kyis dbul gyis bzhes shig/ des lhung bzed bzed pa dang / rgyal po'i bu bsam pa
145a3('dul ba): drag pos lhung bzed der bcud blugs so/ / bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyal po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni 'grub
145a4('dul ba): par 'gyur la/ de yang tshul khrims rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis ka yang sos par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal bu gzhon nu gang yin pa de ning
145a5('dul ba): nyid yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta smos kyang ci dgos// btsun pa rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na gnyis ka
145a6('dul ba): mnyam du bros thebs la/ mnyam du sos par gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las tshogs rnyed pa
145a7('dul ba): rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ 'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig
145b1('dul ba): gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur
145b2('dul ba): rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te// las
145b3('dul ba): rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ chud mi za ba'i tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rA NA si'i grong khyer du/ rgyal
145b4('dul ba): po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to// mdun na 'don la yang bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de mdun
145b5('dul ba): na 'don 'dod par gyur te/ sems can rnams ni khams kyi sgo nas shed 'phrod pa yin pas/ de gnyis phan tshun du yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal bus smras pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na
145b6('dul ba): des na nga rgyal por 'gyur/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis gal te bdag mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni thabs mchis kyis/ snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o// des smras pa/ de ltar bya ste/
145b7('dul ba): gzhug gis smros shig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi gcen zhi bor bgyis dang khyod rgyal por 'gyur ro// des rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas rgyal bu phra bo shos de sman ma yin pa byin nas zhango
146a1('dul ba): gyur to/ / dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shi nas blon po rnams kyis de ni zha bor gyur to snyam nas/ nu bo shos rgyal por dbang bskur ro// des kyang mdun na 'don gyi nu bo shos
146a2('dul ba): gang yin pa de mdun na 'don du bcug go/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dang mdun na 'don lhan cig tu bre mo gtam smra zhing 'dug pa las rgyal pos phu bo zha ba de mthong ngo // des de mthong
146a3('dul ba): nas 'gyod par gyur te/ bdag gis rgyal srid kyi phyir phu bo zhi bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so// lha bdag kyang 'gyod par 'gyur sa/ gal te lha dgyes na 'di phyir sngon gyi
146a4('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o/ / des smras pa/ gnang gis byos shig/ des de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to// de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la bya ba byas nas/ smon lam gdab
146a5('dul ba): par brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing / zha bor byas pa'i

146a7('dul ba): na 'don gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas 'di nyid yin no/ / de gnyis kyis gros byas nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu la sman ma yin pa byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du zha bor gyur to// yang 'gyed
146b1('dul ba): par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te/ slar sman byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du sos par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag/

147b6('dul ba): 'chi ka'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad glags bu la bris te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro// de ni shi'o// blon po rnams kyis/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag

149b2('dul ba): bcos par bya'o/ / chos kyi gang yin des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o// seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o//

149b7('dul ba): pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gtad do// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos kyang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang gtsug lag khang
150a1('dul ba): zhig tu bzhag go/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa khrums spyod chu bzangs kyi dus skyon la 'ongs pa dang / de na de dge slong ma rnams kyis mgron du bos pa yin pas/ gcig gis
150a2('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa deng bdag gis zhal tshul bgyi'o// gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang g.yar tshus la bos so// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol cig

150a4('dul ba): nas/ des de rnams kyi sems srung ba'i phyir g.yar tshus rnams las cung zad cung zad blangs/ de bzhin du dro yang zos/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud pa yang 'thungs pa dang / de dag brtse ga

150b6('dul ba): bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong khrums stod kyi gum pa'i yo byad lhung bzed dang / chos gos gos dang / gos kyi rin du bcas pa'i dngos
150b7('dul ba): po'i sbyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis nus pa/ btsun pa
151a1('dul ba): sa/ dge so yang gzhan du smras/ spang bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan nam mchis dngos po 'atsun pa yangag zhan mchig na/ de'i chos gos dang snang brjed gang dbangs phyu/

151a3('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pa'i ma bgos pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad
151a4('dul ba): ba sogs la ci 'dres sam ma 'dres par gyur pa de brtag par bya'o/ / gal te 'ang+ge te dge 'dun gyi ni mchod rten gyir byas la/ mchod rten gyi ni dge 'dun gyir gyur na/ de lta bu chos dang mi mthun pa yin pas
151a5('dul ba): dede'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / gos kyi rin dang chas pas cha gsum du bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun no// dge 'dun gyi ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar byo'o/
151a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / dri gtsang khang dang / mchod rten gyi lag gi bla'i sar spyad par bya'o// dam pa'i chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya/ seng ge'i
151a7('dul ba): khri brgyan par bya'o/ / gal te 'dres par ma gyur na thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe
151b1('dul ba): dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong zhig shi'o// de rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsug
151b2('dul ba): lag khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang skal ba 'dod par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bgo bar bya'o snyam pa las/ mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i
151b3('dul ba): pab lang rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi dang / rtsa thun dang / shing thun dang / lam gyis 'tshe ba dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing / de rnams gang dang du 'dug
151b4('dul ba): nas 'gyed par byed pa de dang der skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor bar gyur nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bge'o snyam nas/ de rnams kyi /
151b5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo bar brtsams pa dang / dge skos kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig byed/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang // des smras pa/
151b6('dul ba): bdag kyang mtshams su 'ongs pa yin na zhes des 'khang kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
151b7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes te shi ba'i yo byad 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan
152a1('dul ba): cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang la yid gnyis kyis 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgros pa nyes par bgos
152a2('dul ba): pa yin no/ / slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal 'tshabs can du 'gyur ro// mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang gyi 'du shes kyis
152a3('dul ba): 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ rmar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya'o// gzhan du na 'gala' tshabs can du 'gyur ro// mtshams
152a4('dul ba): kyi phyi rol la yid gnyis kyis 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal
152a5('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong ni lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na/ dge slong de gang gis bskur ba de la yid
152a6('dul ba): gcugs pas spyad pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong des yod gcugs par
152a7('dul ba): bya ba ma yin po la yid gcugs par bskyed de/ 'di ltar des gang gis bskur bapa de la yid gcugs par spyad do// 'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag
152b1('dul ba): bskur ba na/ gang la bskur ba de la yid gtsug pas spyad na leg par spyad pa'i'o// gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos
152b2('dul ba): gos dag skur bar byed na/ gang la bskur ba de ni shil/ gang gis bskur pa de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// gang la bskur ba de'i shrI ba'i yo byad du rung bar
152b3('dul ba): byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/ gang gis bskur ba de ni shi la/ gang gis bskur ba
152b4('dul ba): de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des
152b5('dul ba): des slar bzlog la/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no// gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// dge slong gis dge
152b6('dul ba): slosrong la chos gos dgra bskur ba ni/ gang la bskur ba de ni shi la/ gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na// legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no//
152b7('dul ba): gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge 'dun la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur
153a1('dul ba): ba des slar bzlog la/ gang gis bskur ba de yang shi na/ gang la bsgyur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i tshe
153a2('dul ba): byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog nas de shi la/ gang
153a3('dul ba): gis skur ba byed pa de'ang shi na/ de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na
153a4('dul ba): legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ / gos kyi gzhi rdzogs so// // sras brkyang gi gzhi'i sdom ni/ gnas bcas pa dang kha cig dang // rdol ba dang ni blings pa dang /
153a5('dul ba): dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi// nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang // bgos pa dag ni bcu gnyis te// gnas bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa// ston pa blta bar 'dod pa nang // 'dam rdzab kyis
153a6('dul ba): ni ngal gyur pa/ / de la der ni chos gos gnang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis
153a7('dul ba): bzhes so/ / de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan
153b1('dul ba): nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos 'ogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rdza ba chen por tshabs ngas par gyur cing / rdul gyis lus yog bzhin mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba/
153b2('dul ba): dang / mnyan yod du phyin to// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab nas rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang
153b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so
153b4('dul ba): so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong dag khyad dag zod ga nas 'ongs/ gnas gang du dbyar gnas gnas/ btsun pa bdag cag ni gnas
153b5('dul ba): bcas nas dag gzod mchis lags te/ bdag cag gnas bcas na dbyar mchis mchis lags so// dge slong dag khyed cag gnas bcas su ji ga bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas sam// bsod
153b6('dul ba): snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/ btsun pa med par gsol te/ bdag cag gnas bcas su bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas shing / bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis lags
153b7('dul ba): so/ / 'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rdza ba chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / rdul gyis lus yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis te/ rim gyis rgyu
154a1('dul ba): zhing mchis pa na/ tshegs chen pos 'dir mchis lags so// / 'dul ba gzhi// bam po bdun pa/
154a2('dul ba): / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kye mnga'i nyan thos rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rnga ba chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / lus rdul gyis yog pas ljongs rgyu
154a3('dul ba): zhing 'gro ba ni nyon mongs kyis/ ma la ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ dge slong rnams la sra
154a4('dul ba): brkyang gnang bar bya'o/ / 'di ltar sra brkyang ba ting na phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu las thal na ma yin pa dang / zla ba las thal na ma yin pa dang / nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang / bla gos thang
154a5('dul ba): gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba dang / chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang phan yon lnga yod de/ tshogs shing zan ma yin pa
154a6('dul ba): dang / yang yang za na ma yin pa dang / khyim rnams su mgron du ma bos par 'gro na ma yin pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos btsal ba dang / ston zla 'bring po nas/ dpyid bla ra ba'i bar gyi
154a7('dul ba): nang der sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams reg par gnas par bya
154b1('dul ba): ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o// 'di ltar sra brkyang la phan yon lnga yod
154b2('dul ba): zhag bcu thal nas ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang gdang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal
154b3('dul ba): na/ dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang ji ltar gding ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyis rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding
154b4('dul ba): bar bya'o/ / gding ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ re zhig thog mar mthun pa'i go ba bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed nu
154b5('dul ba): chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis brkyang gding bar bgyi'o/ / de nas phyi de nyin gnas mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge
154b6('dul ba): bdun pa na tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar
154b7('dul ba): gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed 'byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'dis sa brkyang bgyis nas tha brkyang gding bar bzhed na/ des na sra brkyang 'ating
155a1('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lha smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la
155a2('dul ba): bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad de/ chos gos 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings so// des
155a3('dul ba): na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas ches pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/
155a4('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa byung ba lags la/ dge 'dun yang sra brkyang bgyi bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis chos
155a5('dul ba): gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad pas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings so// de sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/
155a6('dul ba): sar pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyi zhing / chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ste/ des na sra brkyang bting
155a7('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar bzos pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni
155b1('dul ba): / gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'dis brkyang du mdzad nas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis brkyang du mdzad nas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis brkyang 'drings te/ des nas brkyang bcing
155b2('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin
155b3('dul ba): du 'dzin to/ / de'i 'og tu sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong brko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya zhing / bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o//
155b4('dul ba): lnga gang zhe na/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan
155b5('dul ba): na bsgo bar mi bya ste/ spob pa dang / gzhi nas spob pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gnas nas phyung ba'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko
155b6('dul ba): bar mi bya ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba mi shes pa'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan
155b7('dul ba): pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya zhing / bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis
156a1('dul ba): @mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te zhes bya ba nas/ dge
156a2('dul ba): 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro 'am/ gal
156a3('dul ba): te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge
156a4('dul ba): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong
156a5('dul ba): ming zhes pagyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'drings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun
156a6('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro na/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos
156a7('dul ba): te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bsko bar bzod pa de
156b1('dul ba): dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang
156b2('dul ba): 'dings par bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas gsol bas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong la sra brkyang sbyin par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
156b3('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad lags la/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus
156b4('dul ba): la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi slad du stsal to// 'di ni gsel ba'o//
156b5('dul ba): ngas dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pas/ sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste bkru'o// brkyang ngo // dra'o//
156b6('dul ba): drub bo// kha sbyar ro// chung ngun khab kyis srubs gnyis sam gsum bcom par bya'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcoM
156b7('dul ba): lnga la go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'dings kyis/ khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung zhig/ de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang dri dang me tog gis gtor
157a1('dul ba): zhing / dri zhim po'i bdug pas bdugs nas/ gnas mal bshams te/ gaN+DI brdungs nas/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bskol/ dge
157a2('dul ba): 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / rgan pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o// de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge
157a3('dul ba): 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'dis dge
157a4('dul ba): 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro/ / gding ngo // bting ngo // de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad
157a5('dul ba): ces gnas brtan dgongs su gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos pa lags te/ bdag gis chos gos
157a6('dul ba): 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting lags so zhes brjod par bya'o/ / des legs par bting ngo // shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing
157a7('dul ba): de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par bting ngo / / shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin
