370a5('dul ba): dga' bas/ de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o// khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par
370a6('dul ba): byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/ des de la po nya btang ste tshig rtsub po dang chas pa'i spring yig spring ba
370a7('dul ba): khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnod pa gang yin pa des sdod cig/ kho bo 'o ni
370b1('dul ba): 'ongs nas yul 'khor phur mar rlog go/ / rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste/ blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na
370b2('dul ba): de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon
370b3('dul ba): par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang gzhon pa rgya che bas/ gal te 'dir mchis na
370b4('dul ba): gdon ma 'tshal bar yul phur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/ gzhon nu de rnams ni smyug tu gsol/
370b5('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug/ lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/ lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas/ skyon
370b6('dul ba): ma mchis pa dang nongs pa ma mchis pa yang spyug la/ skyon mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni gzhog go// rgyal po btang snyoms su gzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// blon po
370b7('dul ba): rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o zhes// de nas
371a1('dul ba): de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal gyi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags me tog sna tshog
371a2('dul ba): kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go/ / de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas/ gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos
371a3('dul ba): tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo / / blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i
371a4('dul ba): lags so/ / de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig/ ci'i phyir slar ldog/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i skyed mos
371a5('dul ba): tshal yin na 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/ de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so// blon po rnams
371a6('dul ba): kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis lha gzigs pa'i dus la ba ba lags so// rgyal po chas pa dang / skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra thos
371a7('dul ba): so/ / thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na ku tso'i sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so// gal te de lta na
371b1('dul ba): ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so/ / blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes
371b2('dul ba): gzhon nu de rnams spyug par chas pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig mchi na/ de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka'
371b3('dul ba): stsal par rigs so/ / rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi
371b4('dul ba): sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so/ / blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na sgo chod cig/
371b5('dul ba): de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams
371b6('dul ba): kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag byas te gnas btab ste/ ri dgag gsad cing bsad nas 'tsho bar byed cing / dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do// lang tsho dang dar
371b7('dul ba): la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen te sha bri ngan pa skya bo gseng bseng por gyur to/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skya'i de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag
372a1('dul ba): ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so// des smras pa/ rang rang
372a2('dul ba): gi sring mo spongs la mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug cig/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ngam/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor ba rnams kyis
372a3('dul ba): rung ngo / / de ni de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'
372a4('dul ba): bar byed/ / dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te/ de rnams chen por gyur
372a5('dul ba): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tshor ma ni sgra yin pas/ drang srong ser skya sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dka mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po ci'i
372a6('dul ba): phyir/ bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas so// drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gzhan du mchi na 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la
372a7('dul ba): bogacig/ shes ldan dag rung ngo // drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas/ des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bras nas de
372b1('dul ba): rnams kyis zong khyer brtsigs so/ / drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir bzhi yongs su btang bas/ ser skya'i gzhi ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur ro// de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas/
372b2('dul ba): po'i tshogs chen por gyur to// dog pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to// lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang / de rnams der dong ste grong khyer cig shos
372b3('dul ba): brtsigs nas/ lhas bstan lhas bstan zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spyug pa ni rigs
372b4('dul ba): mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blang bar mi bya ste/ gcig kho nas chos shes par bya'o// de rnams rigs
372b5('dul ba): mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma len gyi rkun ma ni mi len no/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag
372b6('dul ba): gzhon nu de rnams da ltar gang na 'dug/ de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ba' zhig las spyugs pa las/ de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa
372b7('dul ba): nas/ gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs te mas dben gyi sring mo
373a1('dul ba): rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid do// de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na/
373a2('dul ba): bu po dang bu mo dag btsas so// zong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod dam/ lha rdo thog lags so// de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po sa ro stod bzang nas lag
373a3('dul ba): pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched du brjod pas brjod pa/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/
373a4('dul ba): kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes byas pas/ de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram
373a5('dul ba): shing ba 'phags skyes po shi nas/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro// de yang bu med par shi nas/ skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug ga
373a6('dul ba): de yang bu med par shi nas/ lag na rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu med par shi nas/ glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu med par shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por
373a7('dul ba): gyur to/ / de'i bu gnas 'jog go// go'u ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal pos khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i brgyu rgyal lo lnga'i
373b1('dul ba): stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra'o dang / shing rta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang
373b2('dul ba): gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no// go'u ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge 'gram dang / seng ge'i sgra'o//
373b3('dul ba): go'u ta ma dag 'dzam bu gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni/ seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so// go'u ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la pa bzhi ste/ zas gtsang dang / zas
373b4('dul ba): dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / tshad med zas so// bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / bre mo ma dang / tshad med ma'o// zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang /
373b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no// bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags
373b6('dul ba): pa'o/ / tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lhas byin no// gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab sad do// dkar mo'i bu ni 'phreng ba can no// bre bo ma'i ni
373b7('dul ba): bzang len no/ / tshad med ma'i ni dge 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan zin yin te/ go'u ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi brgyud/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin du rdzogs/ srid pa'i
374a1('dul ba): bring rgyun chad/ skye ba'i 'khor ba zad de/ da ni yang srid pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par
374a2('dul ba): mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu legs so legs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun
374a3('dul ba): du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang khyod legs so/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams te chos kyi
374a4('dul ba): gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des na de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
374a5('dul ba): slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig/ zung zhig/ lhogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
374a6('dul ba): brgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan chos dang ldan pa nas/ tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi
374a7('dul ba): rigs brgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing klog pa'i rigs so/ / de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom
374b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhab sa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa
374b2('dul ba): dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar
374b3('dul ba): gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa gzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po
374b4('dul ba): legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod
374b5('dul ba): pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin
374b6('dul ba): du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ / rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/ lta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yul gyi bzang mo lum bi ni zhes bya ba yod do// lhas bstan na
374b7('dul ba): khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba/ yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun
375a1('dul ba): dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'ju
375a2('dul ba): pa der/ rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas/ de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do// lum bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha kun
375a3('dul ba): dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na/ khyod kyis phyir de bas lhag
375a4('dul ba): par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o/ / de nas rgyas po legs par rab sad kyis lum bi ni'i chang du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas/ de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal
375a5('dul ba): zhes bya bar gyur to/ / rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi brgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// rgyal po legs
375a6('dul ba): par rab sad la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/
375a7('dul ba): dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ bltan
375b1('dul ba): sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// bcas pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal pos legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhas
375b2('dul ba): bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di'i yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo// de'i btsas pa'i
375b3('dul ba): btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdag sa zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye
375b4('dul ba): bo'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gyi las kyis rnam par smin pas
375b5('dul ba): gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o/ / gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na ci zhe na las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so/
375b6('dul ba): zhes mchi lags pas/ de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes/ de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so// bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas// chen
375b7('dul ba): mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur
376a1('dul ba): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ / yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/
376a2('dul ba): kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams
376a3('dul ba): cad du dpyad par mi nus so/ / de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par
376a4('dul ba): gzugs bzang bas/ de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags zhes btags so// de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i
376a5('dul ba): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/
376a6('dul ba): bdag la bu mo gnyis shig bcas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dang sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu gcig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni stobs kyis 'khor
376a7('dul ba): los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni 'khor los sgyur bas rgyal por
376b1('dul ba): 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/ seng ge'i 'gram gyis slar spring ba/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos sod kyi
376b2('dul ba): 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur
376b3('dul ba): ro zhes lung bstan pa de re zhig 'dod do/ / cig shos kyang tshogs la brtags par bya'o// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o// de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag cig yod
376b4('dul ba): nas/ shAkya rnams 'dus te rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha skya bseng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo rgas
376b5('dul ba): pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/ / lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa zhing blangs pa de sbyin pa lta na
376b6('dul ba): gtang ngo / / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams
376b7('dul ba): bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta' 'o/ / de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmag bta' lags pas
377a1('dul ba): bdag cag glo ba dga' na/ gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig dbul lo// shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi
377a2('dul ba): bya'o zhes bcas so/ / lha ci khrims dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi dral par mi bya nA/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa zhig slong ba ni mnyam pa las rkun mthangs pa yin no//
377a3('dul ba): lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas seng ge'i 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/ kho bos tshogs la brtags zin gyis/ bu mo cig shos kyang smi zhig/ des de yang 'khor
377a4('dul ba): lnga brgya dang bsgri ste/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas/ ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor
377a5('dul ba): pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa
377a6('dul ba): 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang
377a7('dul ba): lhan cig steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas
377b1('dul ba): na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / brgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa'o//
377b2('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu
377b3('dul ba): zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da lta ni rgyal rigs
377b4('dul ba): btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs
377b5('dul ba): su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs par bya'o snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
377b6('dul ba): chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/
377b7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang/
378a1('dul ba): ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul gang yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/
378a2('dul ba): dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / 'bras dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis
378a3('dul ba): ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ba dag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba
378a4('dul ba): blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad
378a5('dul ba): pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sem dpa' rnam rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub
378a6('dul ba): sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ci lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo
378a7('dul ba): yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yam chad nyid mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no// byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis
378b1('dul ba): mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/ mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa ni yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po rtul
378b2('dul ba): pa dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mong/
378b3('dul ba): pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che
378b4('dul ba): ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing
378b5('dul ba): gsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no// byang chub
378b6('dul ba): sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis brgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgyud
378b7('dul ba): ci 'dra zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing / ma mes dang pha mas zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/
379a1('dul ba): shAkya'i rigs brgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing // mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa ston med pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa'
379a2('dul ba): brgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi brgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo// 'di ltar byang
379a3('dul ba): chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas
379a4('dul ba): rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa'
379a5('dul ba): dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bud med gang zhig gzugs
379a6('dul ba): bzang mo dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag can ma yin la/ rigs 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi
379a7('dul ba): yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur rum du 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs
379b1('dul ba): te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang pha mas zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa dang / rgod bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel
379b2('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzini nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la/
379b3('dul ba): kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams
379b4('dul ba): sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
379b5('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzigs
379b6('dul ba): pa lngas gzigs nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la lan gsum du bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag dga' ldan gyi ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos te/ mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung
379b7('dul ba): ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la/ de'i bur gyur te bdun rtsi rtogs par byas/ khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus kyi mi rnams su nying mtshams
380a1('dul ba): sbyor ba long zhig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'/
380a2('dul ba): mkhyen par mdzod cig/ da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu gling ni rtog ge ba drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug
380a3('dul ba): pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so/ / de la rtog ge pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srungs rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba
380a4('dul ba): can dang / mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka ta'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o// rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze rgyus rgal dang / bram ze rnas rdeg dang /
380a5('dul ba): bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o// snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang /
380a6('dul ba): sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang / kun tu rgyu legs bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang / drang srong ma bcings pa dang / steng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can no// 'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du
380a7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing / bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' gzhugs pas chos bshad de
380b1('dul ba): chos de bdag cag gis thos nas/ ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyid par sems lags so// de skad ces smras pa dang /
380b2('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag de'i phyir rol mo'i cha byad thams cad rdungs shig/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha byad
380b3('dul ba): thams cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/ grogs po dag 'di la sgra lhag par gang che/ bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so// grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi
380b4('dul ba): smras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du/ ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis
380b5('dul ba): mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o// mi rtag pa'i dung bud par bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o// bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o zhes
380b6('dul ba): smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma 'joms// rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig/ brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'jom//
380b7('dul ba): nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel/ grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long zhig/ de rnams lha rnams kyi
381a1('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis/
381a2('dul ba): la bdag gis de la gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang bar
381a3('dul ba): byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du bsgrags nas/ nam gyi gung thun la glang po
381a4('dul ba): cher bstan te btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su zhugs so/ / smras pa/ 'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir dam bzhes nas/ lha rnams la bsgo de nas shi 'phos te/ nang par sprin rum nyi ma gsar
381a5('dul ba): 'char ltar/ de na bu ram shing pa'i lhums zhugs so// 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rmi lam gzhi rmis pa/ glang po che dam pa dkar po mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi rum dral nas zhugs pa dang / steng
381a6('dul ba): gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / ri brag chen po la mdzeg pa dang / bdag la skye bo'i tshogs chen po phyag byed pa'o// des rgyas po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal pos blon po rnams bsgo
381a7('dul ba): ba/ shes ldan dag rmi lam gsod mkhan dang mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khug cig/ de dag gis rmi lam gsod mkhan dang mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos
381b1('dul ba): de rnams la rmi lam bsnyad pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan chos las ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar na/ sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa
381b2('dul ba): zhig bltam par 'gyur te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dang
381b3('dul ba): pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags
381b4('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ / bar sdom la/ 'chi 'pho lha dang rin po che// zung brgyad du ba dang brtul zhugs brtan// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
381b5('dul ba): dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe/ sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing /
381b6('dul ba): 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/ gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag
381b7('dul ba): kyang / de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to// der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba las/ de rnams snang ba des sems can
382a1('dul ba): gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so// chos
382a2('dul ba): nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur
382a3('dul ba): bar/ lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srungs mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gri dang / lag na mdung dang / lag na mdung thung dang / lag na mda' bo che'o// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems
382a4('dul ba): dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa ni/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis
382a5('dul ba): ma spags so/ / dper na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na
382a6('dul ba): bzhugs pa nu/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / zhag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so// chos nyid
382a7('dul ba): kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi sdums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo // dper na nor bu
382b1('dul ba): DUR+Ya zur brgyad pa bzang po rigs dang ldan pa/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ tshon skud sna lnga sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan la brgyus la/ de skyes
382b2('dul ba): bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o/ / 'di ni nor bu'o// skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe yum gyi
382b3('dul ba): lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo // chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhum
382b4('dul ba): na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas lus ngal ba 'am/ lus dub par 'gyur ba med do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom
382b5('dul ba): ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum de phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod
382b6('dul ba): pa spangs pa las slar ldog go/ / ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/
382b7('dul ba): sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed do// srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / brdzun du mi smra chang la mi brkam dang / 'khrig pa'i
383a1('dul ba): mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di/ / 'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i/
383a2('dul ba): tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do// nyon mongs rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing // de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la// de
383a3('dul ba): yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/ / skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtod pa med// sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam nas// des rgyal
383a4('dul ba): po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skye/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lha btsun mo la sras skyes
383a5('dul ba): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// rgyal pos smras pa/
383a6('dul ba): gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud ni cir 'gyur/ sras yan lag ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ nga ming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya 'am
383a7('dul ba): de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin kun tu rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang bzhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas bsgo ba dang / des de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhin 'dug pa la rgya mtsho
383b1('dul ba): po bzhi bstan te chu blud pa dang / de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma btson thams cad thar bar bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos
383b2('dul ba): btson thams cad thar par byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya'o snyam
383b3('dul ba): pa dang / rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas na/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag gis skyed mos
383b4('dul ba): tshal blta'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos skyed mos tshal bstan nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag skyed mos tshal du
383b5('dul ba): 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal po legs par rab sad la lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal yod nas/ de la rgyal po zas gtsang gis spring ba/ khyod kyi bu mo skyed mos tshal du
383b6('dul ba): 'gro bar 'dod kyis skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byos shig/ des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byos shig/ de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor
383b7('dul ba): byas so/ / de nas 'khor rnams dang lhan cig 'dong ngo // de nas des lum bi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa ni shing mya ngan tshang me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhig mthong ste/ de bltams par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug
384a1('dul ba): bad+ma / rnarnams kyi dbang po 'argya rkyen gyis bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum nongam shes pa dang ldan pas/ rtswa ba tshag chen pos bsod na pa sams mi yod kyis
384a2('dul ba): thabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ des rlung dang char drag cig sprul nas des skye ba'i tshogs de kun tu thos so// deras lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid ma mnar mo'i ma byang du mngon par
384a3('dul ba): sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du bsdad pa dang / des bltams par brtsams so// byang chub sems dpal bltams pa dang / brgya byin gyis pags pa'i slebs mos bzung ngo // de nas
384a4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgya byin 'di banag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so zhes dregs par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang
384a5('dul ba): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka thong zhig thong zhig/ bar song zhig/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom
384a6('dul ba): ldan 'das bltams pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur ces bya ba nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes
384a7('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / 'dul ba gzhi// // bam po gya gnyis pa// / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom
384b1('dul ba): sngar 'das sum gyi skums rnas bsdams pa rams rmi shubs nas phyung ba bzhin du langal gyi rmis dang / sha ma'i rmim dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gzhan dang / gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so/
384b2('dul ba): mo nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa de'i tshe/ dor yum mi 'dug mi nyal te 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs sa des rgyal rigs pa ltams par byed
384b3('dul ba): chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la sum kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun 'dor zhing tshig tu yang gsung la/ 'di ni shar phyogs yin te mya ngan las
384b4('dul ba): 'das pa'i thog mar 'gro bar bya'o/ / 'di ni lce phyogs yin te 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o// 'di ni nub phyogs yin te nga'i skye ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro// 'di ni byang phyogs
384b5('dul ba): yin te srid pa'i mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/ / de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po dang rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la bar
384b6('dul ba): snang las chu bsil ba gcig dang chu dron mo gcig ste/ chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing / des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams
384b7('dul ba): pa'i mod la/ skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'bab par gyur te/ de la de'i yum chus chu'i bya ba byed do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la/ lhas par snang las lha'i ut+pa
385a1('dul ba): la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ba dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / ta ma'i la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro// lha'i me tog man da ra
385a2('dul ba): bas kyang 'thor ro/ / lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin no// gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do// bar sdom la/ bltams dang bzhengs dang gom pa bdun/ chu rgyun gnyis dang nu mig lha/
385a3('dul ba): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tshe/ rgyal po bzhi yang bu btsas te/ mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs spyir gyi bu btsas pa na
385a4('dul ba): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas/ de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
385a5('dul ba): khyer na rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas/ 'di'i ming gzugs can
385a6('dul ba): snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ / ko'u sham bi na rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur
385a7('dul ba): bas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ / grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas pa mdo 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu
385b1('dul ba): bcas pa na 'jig rten smyon mas snang ba lta bur gyur pas/ 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te/ de ni de lta ma yin no// 'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems
385b2('dul ba): dpa'i mthu yin no/ / ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba 'jig pa la mkhas 'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/ de'i tsha bo ni mis byin zhes bya'o// des de la dus dus
385b3('dul ba): su 'jig pa'i gtam dang 'chags pa'i gtam smras pas/ de de las rab tu byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltams pa na 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal
385b4('dul ba): bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe mis byin phrag tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa ni/ ngas snang ba de mthong nas/ nyon mongs med la smras pa/ mkhan po/ 'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag/ cig car
385b5('dul ba): 'byung bar gyur tam ci/ / 'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa// 'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur// nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa// nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du no// bu cig snang ba 'di dag ni// yan
385b6('dul ba): lag reg na 'di bsil bas/ / nges par thub pa de yi 'od// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ni// nges par lhums nas bltams gyur la// bltams nas sems dpa' chen po de'i// 'od gzer
385b7('dul ba): gser dang 'dra ba ni/ / dri ma med pa 'di dag gis// 'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas// mis byin gyis spras pa/ mkhan po bdag byang chub sems dpa' ltar mchi'o// des smras pa/
386a1('dul ba): bud ltar byang chub sems dpa' dbang che ba dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing bzhugs pas/ gang yang bdag cag gis skabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod do// gang gi
386a2('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir byon pa nas/ de'i ming 'dogs pa de'i tshe bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // gang gi nyi ma kho na la byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das
386a3('dul ba): bltams pa de nyid kyi nyi ma kho na la rgyal po zas gtsang gi rim gro pa rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang / rim gre ma rnams las 'dun ma la sogs te lnga brgya btsas so// ba glang mo lnga
386a4('dul ba): brgya dang / rta rgod ma lnga brgya la yang 'brangs so// gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snang ngo // khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang dpya phul te blon po rnams kyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang la ji ltar gyur
386a5('dul ba): pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos bsams pa/ bdag gi bu bcas pa na bdag don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/ gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes
386a6('dul ba): gdags so zhes/ de na byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/ 'di lta ste/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba
386a7('dul ba): zhig gnyug mar gnas so/ / shAkya rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u 'am bu mo bcas pa gang yin pa de/ gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug
386b1('dul ba): pa'i phyir khrid pa yin pas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chu gcig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rlon
386b2('dul ba): rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa na/ ser
386b3('dul ba): skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po gzu lums can rtsub pa/ btsam pa med pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na/ thub pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams kyis/ rgyal po la smras pa dang /
386b4('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya 'di rnams ni gtum po gzu lums can btsam pa med pa yin na/ gzhon nu nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas pas/ gzhon
386b5('dul ba): nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis pa btags pa/ 'di lta ste/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi
386b6('dul ba): gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang / gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems
386b7('dul ba): dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang la spras pa/ lha gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs lags so// rgyal pos
387a1('dul ba): thos nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag lhas kyang gzhon nu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas/ de bas na gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags so zhes
387a2('dul ba): de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming ming gsum pa gtags pa/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la ya ba dang yum gyis ma ma rnams la gtad nas
387a3('dul ba): ma ma khyod kyis gzhon nu dus dus su sku mnye byos shog/ dus dus su khrus byos shig/ dus dus su zas byin cig/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig/ ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa
387a4('dul ba): gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su sku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zas byin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do// yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i
387a5('dul ba): ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te pang du bzhag nas/ yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba bskyed do//
387a6('dul ba): chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la/ yab dang yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/ shes ldan dag ji ga gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu
387a7('dul ba): / chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par
387b1('dul ba): 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor la rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun
387b2('dul ba): pa ni blo po rim po che'o/ / bu dpa' ba/ rtul pod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thub pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa de
387b3('dul ba): nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba med la/ chos dang mthun pas leg par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
387b4('dul ba): khyim med par rab tu byung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
387b5('dul ba): ldan nam/ shes ldan dag gang dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur zhi gzhan du ni ma yin zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyi
387b6('dul ba): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni gang dag yin/ lha gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so// zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/ lnga 'dini
387b7('dul ba): gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis las 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
388a1('dul ba): pa mchis te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu ni sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / de'i phyag dang zhabs
388a2('dul ba): 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen
388a3('dul ba): bo'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu ni phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa lags te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba ni/ dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i bzhin no//
388a4('dul ba): lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i ni zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang / byin pa ri dgas e n+ya ya yi lta bu dang / sku ma dud pa dang /
388a5('dul ba): sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis slebs shing reg pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gnon nu 'di ni mngoms kyi
388a6('dul ba): sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni/ dper na glang po cang shes kyi 'am/ rnga nang shes byung ba dag gi bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen
388a7('dul ba): po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu'i sku ji srid par 'dom yang de srid la 'dom ji srid par sku yang de srid pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/ lho 'di rim/
388b1('dul ba): nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu ni sku ro stong spu re re nas skye zhing / de'i sku la s+phu re re nas skye ba yang mthing ka la ga yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye
388b2('dul ba): lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu ni mdog giser 'dra ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / pags pa srab cing mdog
388b3('dul ba): gser 'dra ba lags te/ pags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i chu/
388b4('dul ba): ni bdun mtho ba ste sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang / zhabs gnyis dang / dpung mgo gnyis dang / lhag pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu
388b5('dul ba): chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu'i ni thal gong rgyas pa dang / sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / sku drang zhing kho lags che ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems bzhi
388b6('dul ba): bcu mngal ba dang / choms mnyas pa dang / choms thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin tu dkar ba dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / ra dra ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags
388b7('dul ba): lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lnga gzhon nu ni ljags shin tu ring zhing sras pa lags te/ ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang srab pa nyid kyi phyir
389a1('dul ba): ljags zhal nas phyung bas sgra mtshams nas bzung ste/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes
389a2('dul ba): bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu'i ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu
389a3('dul ba): chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu ni spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su
389a4('dul ba): 'khyil ba lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyis/ gzhan du ni ma
389a5('dul ba): lags pa zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so// gal te gzhon nu rab tu
389a6('dul ba): ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams nas shag bdur lon pa
389a7('dul ba): dang / de sbun pa'i yus nongs par 'gyur te/ nongs ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris kyi nom par skye bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni bzu
389b1('dul ba): bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/ skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba
389b2('dul ba): thob ste/ dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser la mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan brdungs la/ la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du bzhag na shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du
389b3('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das shing / lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no// chos nyid kyis
389b4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag pa nas phrag par sbed pa ni/ dper na ston ka'i
389b5('dul ba): pad+ma skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ongs pas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par rgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no/ / bar sdom la
389b6('dul ba): mig mi 'dzums dang rnam smin dang / gsung snyan 'jebs pa mkhas pa bsdus/ chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzums par gzugs
389b7('dul ba): rnams la lta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa
390a1('dul ba): las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas/ des na de nyin mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor lug tu gzigs so// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i
390a2('dul ba): mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/ dper na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong
390a3('dul ba): ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub
390a4('dul ba): sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa rgyud las 'byung ba'i shes rab 'byor pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i ched la
390a5('dul ba): 'dug nas/ don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge dag shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do// de nas mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ser skya'i bzhir byon nas
390a6('dul ba): de'i mtshan yang gsum btags kyis/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba'i phyir bzhud do// des smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes de gnyis chas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
390a7('dul ba): mthus rdzu 'phrul nyams nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zhugs nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi khyim gyi sgor son pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis/ sgo srungs kyi mil
390b1('dul ba): smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong nyon mongs med lha zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de song nas rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang
390b2('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan nyon mongs med la su zhig 'gog nang du zhugs shig/ de zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod yon spring bas
390b3('dul ba): mchod nas/ stan bltabs te 'dug pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bshes pa'i gtam gyis kun tu dga' bar byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs//
390b4('dul ba): des smras pa/ rgyal chen bdag cag 'dir mchis pa// khyod kyis sras ni mthong bar 'tshal// 'jig rten gtso bo rnams 'dren pa// thug pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal// rgyal pos
390b5('dul ba): smras pa/ gal te de ltar na gzhon nu nyal gyis ma sad kyi bar du re zhig skad cig sdod cig/ des smras pa/ lha mnal log pa nyid blta'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ des ji tsam na
390b6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' mig ma btsums shing mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la lte ba mthong nas/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni// mtshan mong
390b7('dul ba): bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/ / dgos pa don gnyer rnams kyi gnyis// mig la yun ring mi gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod kyi mams pang du blangs nas drang srong la
391a1('dul ba): byin pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lags pa gnyis blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te smras pa/ lha gzhon mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams
391a2('dul ba): la bstan lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bstan to// de rnams kyis ji skad du lung bstan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du
391a3('dul ba): sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa sa bdag
391a4('dul ba): rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ / rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung // bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di na// nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur//
391a5('dul ba): mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po// gling bzhi rnams kyi badrag po dbang phyug 'gyur// thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu bsal bas na// mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo
391a6('dul ba): sbyar/ / zhes smras nas bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha' dang // byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa la brtag pa la zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes
391a7('dul ba): nas khab nas byung nas/ lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te/ de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ngo // bdag ni bar skabs der shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur bar
391b1('dul ba): mthong nas/ de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas spangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis gang mthong na// ngoms par
391b2('dul ba): mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ / lus bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas// drang srong chen po ci slad du bzhin gyur// ga las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa 'am// tshe zad
391b3('dul ba): 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grang / / de ni myur du legs par bdag la spros// khyod kyi mchims bdag ni 'dar bar gyur// drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa
391b4('dul ba): gal te 'di yi steng du nam mkha' la/ / rdo rje'i ser drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang // thub pa chen po'i sku la ba spu ni// nyag ma gcig kyang g.yos par mi nus so// me
391b5('dul ba): chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang / / mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzang dang // drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug rnon yang // gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jig par 'gyur// thugs
391b6('dul ba): rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/ / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// de ni 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na// mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la
391b7('dul ba): 'byung / / 'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi// gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la// tshangs bcas lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa// mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga
392a1('dul ba): la byung / / mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni// gang phyir zhi ba mi thob bdag tu mod// chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang phrad nas ni// don ma thob par
392a2('dul ba): bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ / gang dag smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med pa// 'di yi chos thob 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang // rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag/ skyid cing bsod nams ldan la
392a3('dul ba): rims nad bral/ / drang srong nyon mongs med rgyud nyon mongs pa can gyis bsam pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus padag gi rdzu 'phrul nyams te/ gal te bdag rkang gis song na skye bo
392a4('dul ba): tshogs chen po dang rgyal po 'phya bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras pa/ lha khyod yun ring po nas kye ma'o drang srong nyon mongs med rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs par gyur kyang ci ma rung
392a5('dul ba): snyam du dgongs pa skyes pa/ gdag gis rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir zhugs te da ni rkang kho nas phyir 'byung gis/ khyod kyis lam bstar ba dang grong khyer byi dor byed du stsol cig/ rgyal
392a6('dul ba): bo zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer gyi byi dor dang lam stor du chug la/ lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo
392a7('dul ba): rnams su drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis/ khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de dag byos shig ces dril sgrogs shig
392b1('dul ba): lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gseg pa dang / gyo mo dang / sa gsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag
392b2('dul ba): btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhug/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dbyangs/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi pado dang
392b3('dul ba): sum mdo rnams su dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya shes ldan dag nyon cig/ drang srong nyon mongs med grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis/ khyed cag gis
392b4('dul ba): bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de byos shig/ de nas de nyon mongs pa'i blo dang ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyal po zas gtsang blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / ser skya na gnas pa'i
392b5('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag du ma rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'byor pa mchog gis grong khyer gyi dbus nas dbus su byung ste/ grong khyer ser skya'i sgor byur nas/ rgyal po slar bzlog ste ji
392b6('dul ba): ltar dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin gyi drung du phyin pa dang / de de la 'dzegs nas phan tshun nyul zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas phyogs
392b7('dul ba): shin tu 'dug go/ / de nas de lam gyi dub pa ngal bsos te bsam gtan bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul yang bskyed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong nyon mongs med nad kyis thebs nas
393a1('dul ba): de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas nas 'on kyang phyir thu bar gyur to// de nas mis byis
393a2('dul ba): gyis de'i lus kyi gnas rnams brtags nas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag cag cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni bdud rtsi'i ched dang bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir lags na/ gal te mkhan
393a3('dul ba): pos bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na/ bdud rtsi de las bdag cag la yang bgos shig/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo yang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi'i chad
393a4('dul ba): dang bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir yin na/ kho bos kyang bdud rtsi ma rtogs so// de lta mod kyi shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu gang yin pa des bdud rtsi 'di rtogs par 'gyur
393a5('dul ba): zhing / bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba tshim par byed par 'gyur gyis/ de'i drung du rab tu byung zhig/ khyod rab tu byung nas kyang rigs brjod par mi bya/ rus brjod par mi bya
393a6('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u brjod par mi bya ste/ rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig spyad par bya zhing / bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o// de nas khyod kyis
393a7('dul ba): bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na// shar gyi phyogs su khyod 'dug dang // yang dag sangs rgyas
393b1('dul ba): grags ldan pa/ / rnyed par dkar ba mthong bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing // mngon po rnams kyi mtha' lhung 'gyur// phrad pa'i mtha'
393b2('dul ba): ni bral ba ste/ / gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin// zhes smras te dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to// de nas mis byin gyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas wA rA dzA sir
393b3('dul ba): song ste gnas so/ / de den bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go// mis byin gyi rus kA ta ya nA yin pas/ de'i ming ka t+ya'i bu ka t+ya'i bu zhes bya bar gyur
393b4('dul ba): to/ / de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa na spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka t+yA'i bu de la gdams ngag phog nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa la bsgral te/
393b5('dul ba): shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba bya ngar las 'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur te/ de'i ming ni ka t+ya'i bu chen po ka t+ya'i bu chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas dus gzhan zhig na
393b6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring po ma lon par/ ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas gser gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsres pa'i chan gsol ba na// de ma mas bkag kyang ma
393b7('dul ba): thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsams pa dang / dbrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal pos btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams
394a1('dul ba): pa dang / des kyang ma nus so// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser skyan gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsgo na/ de rnams kyis kyang dbrog par ma nus
394a2('dul ba): so/ / de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gis/ ma la bdag mdzub mo bkug pas
394a3('dul ba): gser gyi gzhong pa nas bzung ngo snyam nas/ des mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang / glang po che lnga brgya po de dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas/
394a4('dul ba): de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa daphrog par ma nus so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po che lnga brgya drangs pa
394a5('dul ba): dang sbyar na/ gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che stong thub kyis/ de bas na gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags so zhes btags so//
394a6('dul ba): bar sdom la/ khye'u dang rtsed mo dag dang ni// rig pa khang bzangs dag dang ni// ngang pa tshon cha dge ba'i snying // dmag dang btsun mo rnams yin no// chos nyid kyil
394a7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon sring bu go cha la yi ge slob par gtad nas/ yi ge'i slob dpon sring bu go chas/ byang chub sems dpa' la yi ge
394b1('dul ba): bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di ni ngas shes so// de nas des yi ge gnyis dang gsum nas/ de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa
394b2('dul ba): dang / byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/ 'di dag kyang ngas shes kyis/ gzhan dag spros shig/ srin bu go chas smras pa/ 'jig rten ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi
394b3('dul ba): gzhan ni bdag gis ma 'tshal lo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/ yi ge 'di'i ming ci yin smros shig/ des smras pa
394b4('dul ba): ma 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na yi ge 'di mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba'o//
394b5('dul ba): nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/ srin bu go cha byang chub sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ yi ge 'di ni 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung ra mngon par 'gyur
394b6('dul ba): te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o// byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags la nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas
394b7('dul ba): dbang byas pas/ tshangs pa'i yi ge tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhang po
395a1('dul ba): bzang len zhes bya ba des glang po che'i gnya' bar zhon pa bslabs nas/ 'phong gi slob dpon ltar bcas zhes bya ba des 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa slob pa la zhugs/
395a2('dul ba): pan/ bzang len gyis lngar bcas la smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin du gzhon nu gzhan dag ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad rlobs shig/ lhas byin/
395a3('dul ba): 'di ni gdug pa'i las byed pa yin gyis/ 'jig rten thams cad la gnod par gyur dang mi rung gis/ 'di la gnang du bsnun pa ma bstan cig/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
395a4('dul ba): bslab pa thams cad la legs par bslabs pas gnas lnga po 'di lta ste/ rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grags par phog pa dang / gnang du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa
395a5('dul ba): dang / tshabs che ba dag la yang byang bar gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs kun tu sgra grags pa shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par
395a6('dul ba): 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po zas
395a7('dul ba): gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po rin po che 'di byung gis dong la de kho na la dbul lo snyam nas/ de rnams
395b1('dul ba): kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las/ rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes te gdug
395b2('dul ba): pa'i las can lhas byin phyir byung ba des glang po che dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes te/ de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes nas dris pa
395b3('dul ba): glang po che dam pa 'di su'i yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la/ yangs pa can gyi
395b4('dul ba): tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/ / lhas byin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ re zhig 'khor los sgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag de la glang po
395b5('dul ba): rin chen 'bul lam zhes smras nas/ thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do// ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag glang po
395b6('dul ba): che bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas byin gyis so// des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la lhas byin gyis mthu sad kyis/ ma la
395b7('dul ba): bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste/ dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur bar bya bar mtha' gcig tu bor ro// ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya
396a1('dul ba): thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/ glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so// sus bsad/ lhas byin gyis
396a2('dul ba): so/ / mgron rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin nam legs pa zhig byas so// phyogs gang du bsad/ 'o nir ro// 'di sus 'dir khyer te 'ongs/ dga' bos so//
396a3('dul ba): des dgongs pa gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis 'di la mthu sad kyis/ ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs
396a4('dul ba): pa las/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs bdun las bzlas te bor ro// de lhung bas gshong gtod pa/ glang po che'i gshong glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to//
396a5('dul ba): der bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mchod rten brtsigs pas/ ding sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa dag phyag byed do// dir smras pa/ lhas byin gyis ni/
396a6('dul ba): glang chen dbang po bsad// dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du khyer// byang chub sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la// rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rkyang ring 'phangs// gzhon nu rnams kyis
396a7('dul ba): smras pa/ mchod pa byed du 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis phyir byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kyang gsan nas 'khor lnga brgya dang mchod pa byed du phyir byung ngo // gzhon
396b1('dul ba): nanu rnams 'bras rnga bzhin du gcod par byed de de rnams kyis shing bcad cing bcad pa rnams 'gyel lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni the'i kha gcod pa bzhin du gcod par mdzad do// des shing bcad
396b2('dul ba): cing bcad pa rnams ma 'gyel te/ de bzhin du 'dug pa dang gzhon nu rnams kyis spras pa/ shes ldan dag / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa stobs dang ldan zhing gnas lnga la byang che zhes
396b3('dul ba): thos na/ 'di gcod par byed pa yang mi shes pa las na/ 'di bdag cag pas stobs dang ldan pa ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis shing gang dag bcad pa de thams cad ni
396b4('dul ba): 'gyel la/ 'dis gang dag bcad pa de dag ni de bzhin du 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya
396b5('dul ba): 'di dag ni byang chub sems pa'i mthu dang bzo la byang ba ma shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas shing mthu la yang smod par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o/
396b6('dul ba): snyam nas/ des de dang mthun pa'i rlung zhig btang bas/ des shing de dag thams cad chem chem zer nas 'gyel te/ shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so//
396b7('dul ba): de rnams tshabs byed pa la zhugs te/ de rnams kyis de na 'ben du lcags kyi ta la bdun dang / rnga dang / phag btsugs so// lhas byin gyis rkang thabs byas te lcags mdanga'
397a1('dul ba): 'phangs pa dang / lcags kyi shing ta la gcig phigs so// dga' bos ni gnyis la'o// byang chub sems dpas ljags mda' 'phangs pa dang shing ta la
397a2('dul ba): bdun dang / rnga dang / phag las thal nas/ lcags kyi mda' de sa la zug pa klus phyung ba dang / chu ro phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 'thung bar
397a3('dul ba): brtsams so/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod rten brtsigs te/ ding sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do// gzhon nu rnams
397a4('dul ba): shing rtar zhugs nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs pa dang / mtshan mkhan grong khyer nas phyir byung ba de rnams kyis/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa shing rtar zhugs nas nang du zhugs pa la lung
397a5('dul ba): bstan pa/ gal te 'di lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu mtshan mkhan rnams
397a6('dul ba): kyis lung bstan to zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ shAkya rnams ba sogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon
397a7('dul ba): nu lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa kho bos thos so// gzhor nu 'di gal te lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung ste/
397b1('dul ba): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir mchi zhing 'dong gis 'di khyim phu bcig/ blon po rnams kyis spras pa/ lha gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams na
397b2('dul ba): du mi gnyer ro/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gzhon nu la bud med thams cad bstan nas 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chung mar blang bar bya'o// de nas kha cig gis smras
397b3('dul ba): pa/ lha gzhon nu ni sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan rnams bud med la stsol du sbrul la/ de ga la mgu ba skye bar gyur pa de btsun mor blang bar bgyi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras
397b4('dul ba): pa de bzhin du gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs rin po ches spras pa'i phung po spungs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyim dang grong khyer byes
397b5('dul ba): dar dang byi dor byed du gtsug nas/ rgyu skar dang / chol blangs dang / yud tsam dag bstun te/ gdan la gshegs su seng ge'i khri bshams pa la gnon nu shAkya thub
397b6('dul ba): pa bzhag nas/ sang ge'i khri dang nye bar rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po spungs te/ blon po rnams dang gzhan yang ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams nang du
397b7('dul ba): zhugs so/ / de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i cha byad dang / rgyar dang / gos gyon nas zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyir ba
398a1('dul ba): la dga' bas rgyan de dag de rnam la byin no/ / shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyi bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba gzugs dang lang tshol bab pa de ma song nas
398a2('dul ba): shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rgyan sbyin gyis song zhig/ des smras pa/ yab ci'o skol cag la rgyan ma mchis sam/ bud med/
398a3('dul ba): pa ni ma yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang bzhed pa de ga dam par mdzad do// yab 'dam yang rung / mi 'dam yang rung / de kho na bdag gi sdum thabs lags
398a4('dul ba): so/ / bu mo gal te de lta na shin tu 'gro dgos pas song zhig/ de nas grags 'dzin ma na tshod gzhon zhing cha lugs bzang ba/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dang mig 'phrog pa
398a5('dul ba): bud med thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi dang ldan pas nang du zhugs nas spyod lam dul bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar 'dug go// byang chub sems dpas
398a6('dul ba): rgyun thams cad byin nas sor gdub rgya kho na lus dang / byang chub sems dpas de la stan pa dang / de nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas mchog tu mnyes pa byas pa des/ seng ge'i
398a7('dul ba): khri'i skas la 'dzegs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyag nas rang gis phyung ngo // blon po rnams dang ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams kyis smras
398b1('dul ba): pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ni bud med thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/ 'di gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus pas 'di blang bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po zas
398b2('dul ba): gtsang gis grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang / gzhon nu shAkya thub pa'i btsun mor blangs so// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
